earphones.title: JAYS - a-One
earphones.product_description: Designed in  SwedenWarm & Smooth Sound Signature1 Year ofWarrantyIdeal for CasualMusic ListeningIdeal forTaking CallsTangle-Free CablesWorks withAndroid & iOS Super LightweightDesign 'They are simply A1 quality' The all-revamped successor to the super-popular a-JAYS One offers a punchy warm sound, tangle-free cables and a simpler, compact form factor for ease of usage.PRAVEEN KAMATHHeadphone Guru About PRAVEEN KAMATHPraveen, our Headphone Zone is an audio connoisseur and staunch Meze fanboy. He loves the RAI Penta and the Empyrean, equally. When not writing about, thinking about or listening to music: He's an avid beerologist too and staunchly believes that the combination of both beats every music setup out there! You'll often find him listening to The Weeknd, The Score and The Script.DESCRIPTIONA PERSONALISED IN EAR FIT TO ELEVATE YOUR MUSIC LISTENING EXPERIENCEThe JAYS a-One is all about comfort with its compact design and a comfortable in-ear fit. Get a personalised in-ear fit with three unique sized silicone eartips which excellently block external ambient noise leaving you with nothing else but pure sound. This stain-free, natural fit encourages a more comfortable music listening experience.MANAGE YOUR MUSIC YOUR WAY WITH A HANDY 3-BUTTON CONTROLStep up your music listening experience on your Apple and Android devices with the JAYS a-One. Equipped with an in-line three-button control that allows you to manage your music as well as calls with absolute ease. A dedicated MEMS microphone allows for smooth and fuss-free calls. Listening to music and handling calls on your in-ear earphones cannot get more efficient than this.TANGLE FREE CABLES FOR THE ULTIMATE WIRED MUSIC LISTENING EXPERIENCEWired listening can be comfortable even with cables. The JAYS a-One comes with JAYS' signature tangle-resistant cable which is designed particularly for a fuss-free music listening experience. With reliable functions and usability, the JAYS a-One offers a solid wired music listening experience.PRECISION-MADE ALUMINIUM HOUSING FOR HIGH-END SOUND QUALITYOne of the highlights of the JAYS a-One is its aluminium housing made by CNC. It has a decal plate made of stainless steel consisting of laser-cut holes. These holes function as a dedicated bass port. Fine-tuned to enhance the bass, this bass port brings your favourite EDM songs to life.SPECSAUDIO SPECIFICATIONSDRIVERS8 mmDRIVER TYPEDynamicDRIVER IMPEDANCE16 OhmsDRIVER SENSITIVITY92 dBFREQUENCY RESPONSE20Hz~ 20kHzCONTROLS & CONNECTIVITYAUDIO PLUG3.5 mmMICROPHONEMEMS microphoneCOMPATIBLE WITHiOS, AndroidINTEGRATED CONTROLSControl buttonsDESIGN & BUILDWEARING STYLEIn-EarCABLE TYPETangle free, flat cableIN THE BOXBOX CONTENTS1. earphones.title: IKKO - OH1S Gems - Blue
earphones.product_description: Chi-Fi ExcellenceV-Shaped Sound Signature1 Year ofWarrantyIdeal forAudiophilesIdeal forCommuting1 X Dynamic + 1 X BADriversDetachable2-Pin CablesTangle-Free CablesWorks withAndroid & iOS Super LightweightDesignDESCRIPTIONEMBRACING THE SVAS TECHNOLOGY TO GAIN DESIGN & SONIC PROMINENCEOne of the key highlights of the IKKO OH1s is the Separating Vector Acoustics System (SVAS) technology. Packing an accurately crafted diffusion cavity structure, the SVAS technology elevates the sound and unit performance to the highest levels even within the confinement of a small space.A 1DD+1BA HYBRID DRIVER SETUP FOR PURE, TRANSPARENT SOUNDThe harmonic blend of 10mm deposited carbon nano Dynamic Driver and Knowles 33518 Balanced Armature gives a naturally balanced sound signature to the IKKO OH1s. Complementing the sound is its resin and aviation-grade aluminium alloy body that lends a physical frequency division effect. This unique setup goes on to reduce mutual interference among the drivers to ensure uncompromised, pure and transparent sound.COMFORT ELEVATING DESIGN MADE OF QUALITY RESIN AND DURABLE METALThe one of its kind mixed material design gives the IKKO OH1s an extraordinary look. The design is made of resin and metal that not only add to the looks but also keeps the earphones lightweight. The oval-shaped earpieces are ergonomically sound while the resin takes care of efficient sound damping ensuring flawless wearing comfort. Additionally, the IKKO eartips provide effective noise isolation further elevating the listening experience.HIGH-FIDELITY AUDIO TRANSMISSION WITH HIGH-PURITY SILVER-PLATED SINGLE CRYSTAL COPPER CABLESThe 127um high-purity single crystal copper cable with silver-plated magnetic core allows high-fidelity audio transmission. These detachable and fully wrapped MMCX cables are made of double-strand braided wire that takes care of cable winding while keeping the overall weight of the cable bare minimum. FAQS

What is the warranty period on the IKKO OH10 Obsidian and how do I claim warranty?

The warranty period on IKKO OH10 Obsidian is for 1 year. Read more information about IKKO's warranty in India.click here.

What is the sound signature in the IKKO OH10 Obsidian?

The IKKO OH10 Obsidian comes with a V-Shaped Sound Signature that delivers a deep bass with great clarity over the mids. So that you can enjoy listening to genres like EDM, Rock, Hip-Hop, Pop or Bollywood.

Will the IKKO OH10 Obsidian work with my smartphone?

Yes! IKKO OH10 Obsidian is compatible to work with both Android and iOS.

How is the overall fit of IKKO OH10 Obsidian?

The IKKO OH10 Obsidian comes with an in-ear design which gives a secure fit.

How many drivers does the IKKO OH10 Obsidian come with? 

The IKKO OH10 Obsidian is loaded with Hybrid drivers. It comes with 1 Balanced Armature and 1 Dynamic Drivers.

Does IKKO OH10 Obsidian have a remote and mic?

No, the IKKO OH10 Obsidian believes in minimalism. Also, what is a remote when compared to the gorgeous sound it offers

Does the IKKO OH10 Obsidian come with detachable cables?

Yes, the cables are indeed detachable. Making for easy storage and convenient for whenever you want to replace or upgrade cables.

Are the cables on the IKKO OH10 Obsidian replaceable?

Yes, the IKKO OH10 Obsidian comes with replaceable 2pin cables.

What is the cable like?

The IKKO OH10 Obsidian comes with 4 Strands of high-purity oxygen-free copper-plated 5N silver-plated.

What is the impedance on the IKKO OH10 Obsidian?

The IKKO OH10 Obsidian comes with an impedance of 18Ω.

Can I require an amp to drive the IKKO OH10?

Although your smartphone and laptop will be able to drive it, an amplifier would certainly bring out the true potential of the IKKO OH10 Obsidian. Read more about amplification and why it's important here. here

Are the cables on the IKKO OH10 Obsidian tangle free?

Yes, the IKKO OH10 Obsidian comes with tangle free cables. One less thing to worry about.

earphones.product_description:
Designed in the USA
Flat Sound Signature

DESCRIPTION



THE LEGACY OF QUALITY AND TRUST


Etymotic is credited with the invention of noise isolating in-ear earphones 30 years ago. The Etymotic design adopted balanced armature receivers and was used for auditory research and hearing tests. This served as the standard benchmark for high definition in-ear earphones. However, the Etymotic ER4 became the first noise-isolating, high fidelity in-ear earphones to be featuring this unique technology in a consumer earphone. That's not all, these in-ear earphones are known to be the world leader for response accuracy when compared to other earphones. Therefore even after years, these reference-quality headphones are preferred by audiophiles, musicians and audio engineers.EXPERIENCE NOISE ISOLATION LIKE NEVER BEFORE


These are the first earphones to provide a completely sealed in-ear fit. They offer 98% (35dB - 42dB) noise isolation which is best when compared to any earphones available in the market. One of the benefits of the best-in-class noise isolation is that you don't have to listen to your music at extremely high volumes.WITH STYLE, COMFORT, DURABILITY AND ASSURANCE


The body of the ER4 is designed with high-grade metal and has an anodized finish. They are built to offer a perfect and comfortable in-ear fit. The reinforced 5ft cables that come with this earphone are detachable and has 3.5 mm gold plated stereo jack as well as MMCX connectors. The Etymonic ER4 earphones feature a user-replaceable filter over the balanced armature drivers to protect it from ear wax. Moreover, these earphones have a 2-year replacement warranty.
RESULT OF YEARS RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT


Etymotic is known as the world leader in sound reproduction. They have unrivalled accuracy in frequency response and audio quality. The ER4 in-ear earphone has 92%+ response accuracy from 20Hz-16kHz. These are exclusive earphones to feature custom made balanced armature drivers with best-in-class output sensitivity.

FAQs

What is the warranty period on Etymotic and how do I make the claim?

The warranty period on all Etymotic products is 2 year. Read more information on Etymotic warranty.

What is the difference between the SR and XR Models?

Both the ER4SR and the ER4XR have distinct sound signatures. While the ER4SR has the most accurate flat response across frequencies, the ER4XR delivers high accuracy response with mildly improved bass frequencies.

What are the differences between the old ER4s and the new models?

There are a bunch of differences in the new ER4 models including its metal body design which has an anodized finish, the replaceable cables, and improved sensitivity to deliver dynamic sound.

earphones.product_description:
Designed & Made in the USA

DESCRIPTION


RICH SOUND DRIVEN BY A 10MM DYNAMIC DRIVER INSIDE A 3D PRINTED SOLID BODY


Using a full-range custom 10mm LCP dynamic driver unit, the Campfire Audio Honeydew covers a wide frequency range of 5Hz to 18kHz while limiting the sound isolation to up to 26dB. This enables the Honeydew to offer clear, deep bass and a wide soundstage leading to the best possible sonic response. For durability, these drivers are fitted inside 3D printed acoustic chambers.

DURABLE STAINLESS STEEL DESIGN IN 'MELLOW YELLOW'


Sporting a polished stainless steel spout, the Campfire Audio Honeydew comes with an all-new moulded ABS PA-757 body in ‘mellow yellow’. This makes the earphones highly durable while also giving them a distinct look. You can store and carry these earphones safely in the Campfire Canvas Zipper Case handcrafted masterfully in Portugal.COUPLED WITH SILVER-PLATED COPPER SMOKY LITE LITZ CABLES


Paired with silver-plated copper Litz cables, the Campfire Audio Honeydew ensures full-fledged high-quality audio transmission. These cables come with a smoky PVC jacket. and comes with a 3.5mm stereo plug to custom beryllium copper MMCX. These cables have a Blue mark to denote the left side while the Red mark shows the right side.
AVAILABLE WITH A HOST OF UNIQUE SIZED EARTIPS AND OTHER ACCESSORIES


These earphones are supplied with a bunch of eartips in multiple sizes, these include Campfire Audio marshmallow tips, silicone earphone tips and additional featured earphone tips. Also accompanied with the Campfire Audio Honeydew are accessories like an earphone clearing tool and a Campfire Audio pin.

DESCRIPTION


NUANCED NATURAL SOUND USING A FULL RANGE BALANCED ARMATURE DRIVER


Packing a single full-range ported balanced armature driver, the Campfire Audio Satsuma brings the intricate nuances of your music to life with its natural and balanced sound. The rear port on the balanced armature drivers enhances the kick of the bass. Moreover, to further aid the driver performance, the Satsuma is equipped with a 3D-printed acoustic chamber that optimises the frequency response curve for detailed audio and spatial accuracy. 

ROBUST STAINLESS STEEL BODY AND A UNIQUE ORANGE FIZZ DESIGN


Sporting a polished stainless steel spout, the Campfire Audio Satsuma comes with a moulded ABS body in vibrant ‘orange fizz’. This 3D printed interior acoustic design lends these earphones a highly durable finish while also making them look unique. You can wear Satsuma comfortably in your ears as it is super light in weight and soft to the touch. Store and carry these earphones carefully in a Campfire Canvas Zipper Carrying Case available in leafy green colour and handcrafted masterfully in Portugal.SILVER-PLATED COPPER SMOKY LITZ CABLES WITH 3.5 MM STEREO PLUG


Paired with silver-plated copper Litz cables, the Campfire Audio Satsuma ensures full-fledged high-quality audio transmission. These cables consist of silver-plated copper conductors and Campfire Audio's custom beryllium copper MMCX connectors. They also come with a smoky PVC jacket and comes with a 3.5mm stereo plug. These cables have a Blue mark to denote the left side while the Red mark shows the right side.
COMES WITH A RANGE OF UNIQUE SIZED EARTIPS FOR A CUSTOM IN-EAR FIT


These earphones are supplied with a bunch of eartips in multiple sizes, these include Campfire Audio marshmallow tips, silicone earphone tips and additional featured earphone tips. DESCRIPTION


FEATURING AN HYBRID TRIPLE DRIVER CONFIGURATION FOR CLEAN AUDIO TRANSMISSION


The BQEYZ Spring 2 is engineered with utmost precision for the best audio reproduction. Spring 2 features a hybrid driver configuration with 3 different types of driver technologies. It comes equipped with a single balanced armature driver, an 13mm dynamic driver with a bionic diaphragm and a 9-layer piezoelectric ceramic driver along with a coaxial dual-cavity patented ceramic horn. With this, the earphone presents a high-resolution outcome. Each of the drivers has been independently fine-tuned for a wide soundstage with lesser resonance. The structural design offers more consistent sound across all frequencies to deliver shiny highs and deep bass. The perfect Triple Hybrid Technology claimed to dampen resonance and improve high-frequency sounds. The low impedance lets you use it with just about any source device of your choice.
ERGONOMIC DESIGN FOR A COMFORTABLE WEARING EXPERIENCE


BQEYZ Spring 2 has been designed keeping comfort in mind. The redesigned Spring 2 features an ergonomically shaped earbud which allows for a secure and snug fit. The new design allows the earbud to sit more closely to the ear, making it super comfortable to wear for long listening sessions and do not cause any fatigue. The cavities of the earbud are made of lightweight aluminium alloy and machined using CNC technology, reducing the overall weight further. The foam ear tips provided with the Spring 2 elevates the fit and enhances the wearing experience.


DETACHABLE CABLE AND 7 SETS OF EAR TIPS INCLUDED


The BQEYZ Spring 2 comes bundled with a detachable 4-strand crystal copper cable with a 2-pin connector. This cable is made of high quality 4 single crystal copper wire and has 224 cores, allowing for transparent and detailed sound transmission. There are also 6 sets of high-quality silicone tips included with Spring 2, allowing users to change the tips best suited for a snug fit. Spring 2 also comes with 1 set of foam ear tips included that provides superior isolation and better comfort.

About PRAVEEN KAMATH
Praveen, our Headphone Zone is an audio connoisseur and staunch Meze fanboy. He loves the RAI Penta and the Empyrean, equally. When not writing about, thinking about or listening to music: He's an avid beerologist too and staunchly believes that the combination of both beats every music setup out there! You'll often find him listening to The Weeknd, The Score and The Script.DESCRIPTION


4 BALANCED ARMATURES + 1 DYNAMIC DRIVER FOR INCREDIBLE SOUND


As an upgraded version of the ZS10, the KZ ZS10 Pro uses customised balanced armature drivers, 2 for the high and 2 for the mid frequencies. It also adopts the 2nd generation Tesla double magnetic dynamic unit for the rhythm and bass.
USES ADVANCED TECHNOLOGY TO MAKE YOUR MUSIC COME ALIVE


KZ's independent research and development with dynamic drivers are responsible for the ZS10 Pro's low-frequency output. It is excellently crafted using the PCB electronic frequency division board resulting in smooth and distortion-free sound. The Dual Balanced Armature drivers are responsible for the mid and treble performance. It provides a high-intensity resolution, rich sense of quality and full vocals that makes these IEMs a pure listening experience for you.


DESIGNED TO LOOK GOOD & LAST LONG


This IEM's faceplate is made of 304 stainless steel while the cavity is made from imported resin. These two different materials add shimmer and an exquisite look to the earphone which also makes them durable and long-lasting. The superior noise isolation cancels out ambient sound.MADE TO BE FLEXIBLE


The ZS10 Pro's wire hooks are made of expensive memory metal, which makes it very convenient for users to adjust the earphones around the ear. The cable that comes in the box terminates in a 3.5mm plug and comes with an inline remote & mic. It's easy to change your IEMs from wired to wireless or upgrade the cable with the detachable 2-pin slots. The new limit slot protection design keeps the pins from breaking and ensures a longer life.

DESCRIPTION


DUAL MAGNETIC CIRCUIT DYNAMIC DRIVER FUSED WITH ELECTRONIC CROSSOVER BOARD FOR CLEAN SOUND


KZ EDX Pro showcases the all-new special 10mm dual magnetic circuit driver unit. Dual magnetic circuit dynamic driver unit brings a more natural low-frequency response and transparent high-frequency performance. The electronic crossover board is integrated into the driver units through sophisticated technology to enhance the low-mid frequency range performance. The frequency response for the EDX Pro is from 10Hz-20kHz with a grand sound stage. This makes these IEMs suitable for electronic, rock, r&b and heavy instrumental music.
DELIVERING PRISTINE SOUND QUALITY FOR ON-STAGE MONITORING NEEDS


The KZ EDX Pro comes with powerful dual magnetic driver units which are fully optimised for stage performance. The advantage of the dual magnetic circuit dynamic driver is the solid and abundant magnetic field, which provides shocking low-frequency sound effects, and gentle and sweet vocals as if being in a concert space. These IEMs deliver HiFi grade sound that highlights details of the sound so that you don't miss the finer nuances of how your instruments sound.



ERGONOMIC DESIGN FUSED WITH STUNNING APPEARANCE AND INLAY TECHNOLOGY


The engineers at KZ left no stone unturned when designing the EDX Pro. The entire design and appearance have been upgraded and utilise a high-end inlay process. During this process, the imported resin cavity is matched to metal ornaments showcasing extraordinary texture. KZ EDX Pro has the same ergonomic cavity structure as always. The lightweight cavity fits the auricle, and PU ear hooks reduce stress. You can wear KZ EDX Pro for a long time without pressure.


UPGRADABLE FLAT OXYGEN-FREE COPPER CABLE WITH GOLD PLATED 2-PIN CONNECTOR AND HD MICROPHONE


EDX Pro comes equipped with a 5N oxygen-free, 2-pin upgradeable flat cable having a 0.75mm standard gold-plated pin. The flat cable prevents entanglement. The KZ EDX Pro cable has an HD microphone with one-touch functions, allowing you to manage your music playback and answer calls efficiently with the EDX Pro. The microphone used in this cable is a customised condenser microphone and is compatible with most mobile phones out there. You can further upgrade this cable for the Hi-Fi audiophile experience. Transform the EDX Pro into a Bluetooth headset using the Bluetooth module upgrade cable, to be purchased separately.LOW IMPEDANCE ALLOWING USE WITH VARIOUS DEVICES


With the KZ EDX Pro, you have the freedom to connect to various devices and enjoy high-quality sound. With 24 ohms of impedance, it is easy to drive these IEMs regardless of the device it is connected to. With mobile phone playback, there are also cinema-level sound effects. You can listen to music anytime and anywhere, no need to carry heavy professional players with you.

Super LightweightDesign

 The Balanced Armatures adds the Pro, while the dynamic driver adds the X. The Hybrid drivers tag team to offer a sound that is unheard of, at a price point unseen.

PRAVEEN KAMATH
Headphone Guru 



About PRAVEEN KAMATH
Praveen, our Headphone Zone is an audio connoisseur and staunch Meze fanboy. He loves the RAI Penta and the Empyrean, equally. When not writing about, thinking about or listening to music: He's an avid beerologist too and staunchly believes that the combination of both beats every music setup out there! You'll often find him listening to The Weeknd, The Score and The Script.DESCRIPTION


UPGRADED KZ ZSN PRO X FEATURING A HYBRID DRIVER SETUP


There has been a significant number of changes done to the all-new KZ ZSN Pro X. It features a customised 30095 high frequency balanced armature and a 10mm mid-bass low-frequency dynamic driver in a hybrid setup. Tuned flawlessly by a dedicated team of acoustic engineers, the KZ ZSN Pro X has a balanced armature driver. Dynamic lows, soothing mids and clear highs are adjusted to perfection. So the next time you can enjoy the vocals of your favourite artist in great detail and accuracy. You also get a brand-new high-purity silver-plated cable which improves the performance of the highs and the lows. The blend of metal and resin design along with bright colour options gives the KZ ZSN Pro X a refreshing new look.
HIGH-GRADE ACOUSTIC TECHNOLOGY FOR UNRIVALLED SONIC PERFORMANCE


These earphones come with a refined and dynamic 10mm dual magnetic driver delivering sonic excellence. Oftentimes, magnetic drivers have to deal with magnetic gaps but that's not the case with the KZ ZSN Pro X. The magnetic driver of the ZSN Pro X is optimised to reduce magnetic gaps and to prevent eddy current loss. This paves the way for an enhanced low-frequency power and allows for wider frequency response ensuring a comprehensive music listening experience.COMFORT ELEVATING FIT FOR PERFECT NOISE ISOLATION


The in-ear fit is all about comfort. Comfort that helps you enjoy your music even for extended hours. The KZ ZSN Pro X offers that comfort with an ergonomically designed curved cavity. This cavity is uniquely engineered to ensure that comfort is not lost even when you are wearing these earphones for too long. Not just that, this comfort-elevating fit also leads to effective noise isolation for peaceful music listening.



PREMIUM 100 CORE SILVER-PLATED CABLE WITH HD MICROPHONE AND IN-LINE CONTROLS


The cable bundled with the KZ ZSN Pro X is built with high-quality materials, offering superior audio transmission. This cable features 100 core high-purity silver-plated cable with 4 strands of wire tightly wound, elevating the audio resolution. The result of this cable is wide and natural-sounding audio with minimum distortion and loss in signal transmission. These cables come embedded with an HD condenser microphone allowing communication. This microphone is a high-quality mic capable of transmitting clean audio. There are quick-access functions assigned to the button on the microphone housing and it allows for receiving calls, rejecting calls, playing/pausing music and changing the songs played. This is truly useful as you don’t need to access your devices to execute these frequently used functions.



2PIN CONNECTOR WITH DETACHABLE CABLE ALLOWING FOR UPGRADABILITY


The design for the KZ ZSN Pro X is carefully engineered, featuring a 2PIN connector and detachable cables. The detachable nature of the cable allows the earphones to be able to attach to different cable accessories. KZ ZSN PRO X supports the additional Bluetooth module and can be easily upgraded to a wireless headset.
FEATURING ALLOY-SHELL DESIGN WHICH GIVES A STUNNING LOOK TO YOUR KZ ZSN PRO X


The streamlined metal and resin design gives a strikingly unique look to your KZ ZSN Pro X. The colours breathe new life into the design. High-grade Zinc Alloy is used for the faceplate while the cavity uses imported resin. The blend of unique materials and the use of a wide range of colour options add a modern look to the KZ ZSN Pro X.

Super LightweightDesign

 The entry-level FA1 is neutral, analytical with a great tonal reproduction. The Knowles-tuned Balanced Armature driver earphone is suited for a purist seeking the perfect replication of sound.

PRAVEEN KAMATH
Headphone Guru 



About PRAVEEN KAMATH
Praveen, our Headphone Zone is an audio connoisseur and staunch Meze fanboy. He loves the RAI Penta and the Empyrean, equally. When not writing about, thinking about or listening to music: He's an avid beerologist too and staunchly believes that the combination of both beats every music setup out there! You'll often find him listening to The Weeknd, The Score and The Script.DESCRIPTION


PRECISION CARVED USING THE CUTTING-EDGE 3D PRINTING TECHNOLOGY


Made out of advanced industrial-grade 3D printers, the FiiO FA1 uses DLP printing technology with resolution up to 25um. This 3D printing technology is drastically different from traditional moulding or injection moulding processes as it offers better unit-to-unit consistency as well as excellent sound, overall. Aimed at making great sound accessible to everyone, the FiiO FA1 packs the best of features including the Knowles BA driver and state-of-the-art 3D printing process. 

CUSTOMIZED BA DRIVER WITH MICROMETER SOUND TUBE FOR A DETAILED & NATURAL SOUND


Employing a customized BA driver jointly developed by FiiO and Knowles, the FiiO FA1 is all set to deliver mesmerizing sonic performance. This driver has a low impedance of 15-ohm meaning that the FA1 can be paired with almost anything, even your phone for great sound. There is a specially designed micrometre sound tube that is fine-tuned to offer natural yet smooth sound. Overall these setups help the FA1 to produce fast, powerful bass, rich mids and detailed treble that makes you love your favourite music even more.MARVEL AT THE ELEGANT TRANSPARENT DESIGN AND ENJOY THE ABSOLUTE WEARING COMFORT


Blending the eye-catching ripple texture faceplate with the gorgeous transparent body, the FiiO FA1 is a beauty to behold. Take time to appreciate the detailed intricacies of FA1's design. This design was finalised after testing tens of thousands of human ears with intentions to offer supreme comfort and to allow the sound to flow naturally into your ears. Adding to this comfort is the low weight of 4.5g per unit along with the skin-friendly resin material used in the outer shell of the FA1. The resin is highly durable as well as it can retain its colours for years.
OXYGEN FREE COPPER-PLATED SILVER CABLE TO ACCENTUATE CLEAR SOUND AND WIDE SOUNDSTAGE


Apart from enhancing the sound, the detachable MMCX cable of the FiiO FA1 is replaceable as well. This allows you to change the MMCX cable with a more premium cable of your choice. The 3.5mm-terminated cables that come with the FA1 are made of oxygen-free copper-plated silver wire that is capable of transmitting clear sound with a wide soundstage.

Super LightweightDesign


 FiiO's FD3 is my favorite IEM for less than 10k. Super smooth and detailed sound, a nice wide sound stage, and enough punch to make any music sound fun. A single Dynamic driver is not to be discounted. They're very capable.

RAGHAV SOMANI
Headphone Guru 

About Raghav Somani
Raghav Somani is the Founder & CEO of Headphone Zone. An avid audiophile and musician since 2008, his choice of headphones include STAX Electrostats, Audeze LCD 3, and for music on the go, the JH Audio Roxanne + Astell&Kern SP1000 is never too far away. On his playlist, you'll find A.R. Rahman, Michael Jackson, and the Eagles.

DESCRIPTION


FEATURING FLAGSHIP-LEVEL DYNAMIC DRIVER WITH 1.5 TESLA MAGNETIC FLUX AND JAPANESE VOICE COIL


FiiO FD3 Pro continues in the direction of its FD line siblings in using the flagship-grade 12mm dynamic driver. The inside of the FD3 Pro shell is embedded with a driver with a robust magnet of 1.5 Tesla magnetic flux, paired with an ultra-fine copper-clad aluminium Japanese Daikoku voice coil for accurate sound reproduction.ULTRA-MODERN DLC DIAPHRAGM AND ACOUSTIC PRISM SYSTEM FOR LOW DISTORTION AND SUPERIOR CLARITY


Flag-ship grade components have been used in the design of the FiiO FD3 Pro. The diaphragm is made of diamond-like carbon (DLC) which is rigid and surprisingly light. This design decision makes the FD3 Pro comfortable to wear and also reduce unwanted distortion having a tremendous transient response. The FD3 Pro’s are further enhanced with the acoustic prism system which brings numerous benefits such as eliminating high frequency standing waves, enhancing overall sound wave diffusion and even effectively solving the problem of time delay caused by sound wave propagation path in the cavity. This all leads to amazing sound quality.COMES WITH EXCLUSIVE HIGH PURITY LITZ CABLE AND HI-RES AUDIO CERTIFICATION


FiiO FD3 Pro comes with a carefully engineered cable that enhances the listening experience. The FD3 Pro comes with an exclusive cable made of high purity monocrystalline silver-plated copper cable with 8 strands of 19 wires each for a total of 152 wires braided together in Litz type 2 style. In addition, the cable features blue (left) and red (right) markings for convenience as well as interchangeable audio plugs, allowing you to switch between 2.5/3.5/4.4mm plugs depending on your source. The cable features an MMCX connector for connectivity. This reproduces music vividly and with superior clarity. The FD3 Pro is a Hi-Res Audio certified earphone and is capable of reproducing delicate details.

INDUSTRIAL GRADE ALUMINUM-MAGNESIUM ALLOY BODY FUSED WITH A SEMI-OPEN DESIGN


High-quality craftsmanship is the primary goal at FiiO and this is reflected in the FD3 Pro unmistakably. The main body is made of aluminium-magnesium alloy in an industrial process combining five-axis CNC processing and hand polishing. This makes the body durable and super elegant to look at. The FD3 Pro features a semi-open design that is based on the company’s patented technology for balanced air pressure. This semi-open design provides a natural sound and also effectively protects your hearing by balancing air pressure within the body and leads to less pressure on your eardrums. This enhances the listening experience tenfold, making the sound less forced.
PERFECT BALANCE BETWEEN FORM AND FUNCTION


The look of the FiiO FD3 Pro is based on the theme of curves and is simple yet has a beautiful appearance. This is visible in the unique celluloid panel which is covered with 2.5D film coating glass for a Pure transparent look. The FD3 Pro also features interchangeable sound tubes for customising the frequency response of the earphone. How this works is, while the outer diameter of the sound tubes is the same, the inner diameter differs for each sound tube. The large inner diameter tube (black) produces detailed treble, and the small inner diameter tube (red) gives robustness. This is a truly unique approach and is the perfect balance of form and function.SPECSAUDIO SPECIFICATIONS

FAQS

What is the warranty period on the FiiO FD3 Pro and how do I claim warranty?

The warranty period on FiiO FD3 Pro is for 1 year. Read more information about FiiO's warranty in India.click here.

How many drivers does the FiiO FD3 Pro have? What is the included cable made of?

Following in the footsteps of the FD5, the FiiO FD3 Pro is composed of a 12mm dynamic driver with its diaphragm using Diamond-Like Carbon (DLC) that is capable of 1.5 Tesla magnetic flux.

What is the included cable made of? Is the cable interchangeable?

The FiiO FD3 Pro comes with an 8-stranded 152-core Litz braided high-purity monocrystalline silver-plated copper cable with interchangeable 2.5mm, 3.5mm and 4.4mm audio plugs.

Does the FiiO FD3 Pro come with detachable cables?

Yes, the cables are indeed detachable. Making for easy storage and convenient for whenever you want to replace or upgrade cables.

Are the cables on the FiiO FD3 Pro tangle free?

Yes, the FiiO FD3 Pro comes with tangle free cables. One less thing to worry about.

How is the overall fit of FiiO FD3 Pro?

The FiiO FD3 Pro comes with an over-the-ear design which gives a secure fit. Also the lightweight design of FD3 Pro makes them comfortable to use for long hours.

Does FiiO FD3 Pro have a remote and mic?

No, the FiiO FD3 Pro believes in minimalism. Also, what is a remote when compared to the gorgeous sound it offers

What is the impedance on the FiiO FD3 Pro?

The FiiO FD3 Pro comes with an impedance of 32Ω@1kHz.

What are the accessories included with the FiiO FD3 Pro? 

The FiiO FD3 Pro is rest assured with abundant accessories:--Balanced ear tips*3 pairs (SML) --Bass ear tips*3 pairs (SML) --Vocal ear tips*3 pairs (SML) --Foam ear tips*2 pairs --Cleaning brush --Storage case --MMCX assist tool --Interchangeable sound tube*1 pair

How do the appearance and structure of the FD3 improve its sound performance (the small hole on the front cavity, semi-open acoustic design, front acoustic prism)?

[The advantage of the small hole in the front cavity] 1. The small hole in the front cavity is used to relieve air pressure. It can help to moderate pressures that happen to the ear canal when putting the FD3 Pro inside the ears. If the front hole is blocked, it would enhance the bass performance. However, hearing fatigue would also be caused easily due to increasing pressures in the ear canal. 2. The diaphragm of the FD3 Pro is made of Diamond-Like Carbon (DLC). Therefore, if the front pressure-relief hole is blocked, it will cause unneeded distortion due to slight transformation of the diaphragm when it is vibrating. [Semi-open acoustic design] The semi-open acoustic design of the FD3 based on FiiO's patented technology for balanced air pressure within brings several advantages. Not only does such a design lead to more natural sound, but it also effectively protects your hearing by balancing air pressure within the cavity, leading to less pressure on your eardrums. This makes your listening experience less tiring and the sound less forced. [Front acoustic prism] The acoustic prism so effectively used in the flagship FD5 for great sound quality is also featured in the FD3 Pro. Like with the FD5, the acoustic prism system brings numerous benefits such as eliminating high frequency standing waves, enhancing overall sound wave diffusion, and even effectively solving the problem of time delay caused by sound wave propagation path in the cavity. This all leads to marvelous sound quality that will surely take your breath away.

How to distinguish between the left and right channels? 

Left/L: blue  Right/R: red The FiiO FD3 Pro has unit markers on both earphone units: blue L on the left channel and red R on the right. Other than the letter marker, there are corresponding colors at the position of the MMCX connectors, left blue and right red. Please fit the correct channel according to the indication markers when changing the cable.


Warranty
1 Year Warranty
Don't sweat it, this FiiO FD3 Pro comes with a 1 year warranty from FiiO that covers manufacturing defects. All products featured on Headphone Zone are backed by an original manufacturer's warranty. Read more about FiiO's warranty in India.

Super LightweightDesign

 The entry-level FD1 is fast, punchy with a strong sub-bass. The single energetic dynamic-driver earphone is perfect for a beginner audiophile.

PRAVEEN KAMATH
Headphone Guru 



About PRAVEEN KAMATH
Praveen, our Headphone Zone is an audio connoisseur and staunch Meze fanboy. He loves the RAI Penta and the Empyrean, equally. When not writing about, thinking about or listening to music: He's an avid beerologist too and staunchly believes that the combination of both beats every music setup out there! You'll often find him listening to The Weeknd, The Score and The Script.DESCRIPTION


BERYLLIUM-PLATED DD + 2-WAY MAGNETIC CIRCUIT FOR A MARVELOUS SONIC PERFORMANCE


Packed with premium-grade headphone technology, the FiiO FD1 is at the top of its game. Adopting an ultra-thin yet durable beryllium-plated diaphragm dynamic driver, the FD1 produces magnificent sound for a deeply moving music listening experience. The dynamic driver of the FD1 is backed by an N50 two-way magnetic circuit that has 55% magnetic flux promotion and about 1 Tesla of magnetic field intensity. The powerful magnetic flux leads to vigorous bass reproduction and pleasant transient response.
PRESSURE RELIEF TECHNOLOGY FOR HOURS OF COMFORTABLE MUSIC LISTENING SESSIONS


With the employment of FiiO's patented balanced pressure relief technology, the FiiO FD1 is able to optimise pressure ensuring distortion-free sound reproduction. Overall the FD1 is tuned to match the popular style and is easy to drive making it compatible with a host of audio devices. These IEMs highlight the charm of your favourite tunes and allows you to listen to them comfortably for hours.GOLD-PLATED RETAINING RING & SOUND TUBE FOR SONIC EXCELLENCE & DURABILITY


These are precisely designed IEMs with a gold-plated aluminium alloy retaining ring and dedicated sound tube on each earpiece. This not only adds to the beauty of the FiiO FD1 but also provides stability leading to an incredible sonic performance. Go way beyond CD-quality audio with the FiiO FD1 as they are Hi-Res Audio certified by the Japan Audio Society. 

ENCHANTING CELLULOID FACEPLATES AND ERGONOMICALLY DESIGNED FOR WEARING COMFORT


Sporting rich layers of celluloid materials, the faceplates of the FiiO FD1 come with a unique texture and style that make them look absolutely stunning. These faceplates also have a subtle golden FiiO logo along with glittering and translucent light. Ergonomically designed to weigh around 4.5g per unit, the FD1 is lightweight and so comfortable to wear that you won't realise if you have them on.

HIGH-PURITY MONOCRYSTALLINE COPPER LITZ CABLE FOR QUALITY AUDIO TRANSMISSION


Equipped with 120 cores 4-stranded high-purity monocrystalline copper cable, the FiiO FD1 produces rich bass, lifelike vocals and enhanced sound quality. Each Litz wire in the cables is insulated to ensure high-quality audio transmission while avoiding adverse skin and proximity effects. These cables have a technical metal splitter and come with 0.78mm 2-pin connectors and a gold-plated 3.5mm plug. With left blue and right red marking you can easily distinguish the right and the left earbud.SPECSAUDIO SPECIFICATIONS

FAQS

What is the warranty period on the FiiO FD1 and how do I claim warranty?

The warranty period on FiiO FD1 is for 1 year. Read more information about FiiO's warranty in India.click here.

How many drivers does FD1 have? 

The FD1 is composed of a 10mm dynamic driver, using the dual magnetic circuit structure.

Is the FD1 easy to drive? Could they be driven by average cellphones? 

The FD1 has low impedance yet high sensitivity. With 106dB sensitivity, it can be easily driven by average cellphones.

What is the tuning style of the FD1? What type of music is it suitable for? 

The FD1 is a new earphone with a 10mm dynamic driver. So it can balance the characteristics of all-frequencies. It adopts the popular tuning style of HiFi level. The elastic and deep bass, smooth highs and wide sound field allow it to fit in all kinds of music styles.

What's the shell material of the FD1?

The shell of the FD1 is featured with transparent PC material while the faceplate uses multiple layers of celluloid. For every piece of celluloid is unique, the FD1 is showinging an abundant layered look, literally colorful with personality.

How to choose the right eartips for the FD1?

The sound tube size of the FD1 is 5.8mm, so you can select eartips whose inner diameter is between 4 to 5mm.

What's the color of the FD1? Will there be any different colors? 

The FD1 is available in black and blue. You can visit our official web for later color information.

Is the FD1 comfortable to wear?

Based on a number of ear data sampling combined with digital modeling technology, we have made the FD1 even more like a custom IEM for truly excellent comfort. It came out with a shape that more closely follows the shape of the human ear, allowing everybody to put on the FD1 more easily and wear it more stably for longer periods of time.

Is the FD1 with a detachable cable design? What's its connector?

The cable of the FD1 is detachable. It is structured with 0.78mm 2-pin connectors.

What's the material of the FD1's included headphone cable ? 

The FD1 adopts an imported cable made of 120 braided individual high purity monocrystalline copper Litz material. Each Litz wire is insulated from each other, ensuring better audio transmission performance under the naturally-occurring yet adverse skin effect. What this means for actual listening is improved bass and mids, as well as more coherency between all audio frequencies. The monocrystalline Litz copper cable is semipermeable black with great texture. The detachable connector is designed in a 0.78mm 2-pin structure with 3.5mm single-ended connectors. Additionally, we provide four-stranded monocrystalline silver cable of 2.5mm, 3.5mm and 4.4mm connectors, which are available to choose for your preference.

How to exchange the headphone cable for the FD1?

First, standard cables with 0.78mm 2-pin connectors are a must. When attaching or detaching the cable, remember to keep the earphone and the cable aligned in a straight line with the left and right sides connected correspondingly.

How to tell the left and right channel？

There is a left and right letter on both of the connectors. Besides, left blue and right red markers make it easier to distinguish sides. When replacing cables, please remember to distinguish the left and right sides.

What's the difference between different eartips?

Both of the red and black eartips are bass eartips which are better to perform low frequency. Whereas the pure black one is balanced eartips. The actual sound quality would be vary among different listeners. You can refer to the audition.

Super LightweightDesign

 The FH1s features a 13.6mm dynamic driver and a single Knowles BA driver. The bigger dynamic driver pushes more air, having a higher impact in the lows. This makes for a fuller experience no matter what the song.

PRAVEEN KAMATH
Headphone Guru 



About PRAVEEN KAMATH
Praveen, our Headphone Zone is an audio connoisseur and staunch Meze fanboy. He loves the RAI Penta and the Empyrean, equally. When not writing about, thinking about or listening to music: He's an avid beerologist too and staunchly believes that the combination of both beats every music setup out there! You'll often find him listening to The Weeknd, The Score and The Script.DESCRIPTION


SPECIALLY-TUNED SOUND SIGNATURE FOR AUDIOPHILES AND CASUAL LISTENERS ALIKE


Based on the highly acclaimed FiiO FHI, the all-new FiiO FH1S now features even better sound than ever before. Packing a larger, enhanced dynamic driver along with a Knowles balanced armature driver, the FH1S produces intense bass, rich vocals, incredibly clear mids and highs. Adopting a finely tuned sound signature, the FiiO FH1s lures not just audiophiles but mainstream listeners as well.

33518 BA DRIVER FROM KNOWLES FOR EXTRAORDINARY TREBLE AND VOCALS


Positioned at the front of the ear shells, the Knowles 33518 balanced armature driver stays close to your ears to eliminate high-frequency sound loss leading to better treble extension. This driver delivers high frequencies using a brass sound tube that keeps a check on unwanted resonances paving the way for lifelike high frequencies.
FEEL THE PUNCH OF THE BASS WITH THE 13.6MM DYNAMIC DRIVER


Consisting of a bio-polymer diaphragm, the 13.6mm dynamic driver of the FiiO FH1S is driven by the powerful N50 magnets. The use of this setup does a crucial job of producing a fast yet strong bass response while allowing clear drums for remarkable overall sound.



BALANCED PRESSURE RELIEF TECH FOR A SPACIOUS SOUNDSTAGE


The performance of the already potent 13.6mm dynamic driver is further propelled by FiiO's patented balanced pressure relief technology. This technology optimises the air pressure in the front and the back of the body reducing listening fatigue and elevating to a wider soundstage.
LAYERED CELLULOID FACEPLATES FOR A STRIKINGLY UNIQUE DESIGN


Celluloid—a widely popular material used in guitar picks, known for its inherent musical qualities, is employed in FH1S’s faceplate as well. Celluloid has a random layered design that gives each faceplate its very own unique personality. There are left blue and right red markers on the FH1S to help you to distinguish between the left and the right earpiece.CUSTOM MADE ERGONOMIC IEM ENSURING EVERLASTING COMFORT


Acting on customer feedback received for other FiiO IEMs, the latest FiiO FH1S is designed more like a custom IEM to offer personalised comfort. After brainstorming on countless design iterations, Fiio finally settled on a unique design that complements the shape of human ears. This allows you to wear it comfortably for hours without feeling any sense of strain.



120-CORE HIGH-PURITY MONOCRYSTALLINE COPPER CABLE FOR FLAWLESS AUDIO TRANSMISSION


Equipped with the custom 120-core high-purity monocrystalline copper Litz cable, the FiiO FH1S is capable of high-quality audio transmission. With each Litz wire insulated, these cables carry out refined audio transmission without getting affected by the adverse skin effect. Due to these cables, you can enjoy upgraded bass and mids, as well as all-round audio coherence. The gold-plated 0.78mm 2-pin connectors aid compatibility and durability.



TRANSFORM THE FH1S TO A WORKOUT-FRIENDLY WIRELESS IN-EAR MONITOR


Using the UTWS1 true wireless Bluetooth module (0.78mm 2-pin edition), you can upgrade the FH1S to a wireless IEM in no time. This module uses TWS+ technology and extends support to aptX Bluetooth audio codec allowing you to experience quality sound while enjoying wireless convenience. So be it in the gym or on the road, if you are looking for added wireless convenience, the FH1S is for you.



EFFORTLESSLY DRIVEN HI-RES CERTIFIED IEMS PAIRED WITH PRACTICAL ACCESSORIES


With 26Ω impedance and 106dB sensitivity, the FiiO FH1s can be easily driven by even ordinary phones to experience its warm and transparent nature sound. You can even enjoy Hi-Res audio on the FH1S as it is Hi-Res Audio certified by the Japan Audio Society. Multiple accessories come included with the FiiO FH1S including 3 pairs of bass ear tips, 3 pairs of balanced eartips, 1 pair of foam eartips, an earphone cable and an HB1 carrying case.SPECSAUDIO SPECIFICATIONS

What is the warranty period on the FiiO FH1S and how do I claim warranty?

The warranty period on FiiO FH1S is for 1 year. Read more information  Click here.

What is the sound signature in the FiiO FH1S?

The FiiO FH1S comes with a Balanced Sound Signature that delivers great clarity over the mids with punchy bass. The FH1S is a perfect fit if you like listening to all kinds of genres.

How many drivers does the FiiO FH1S come with? 

The FiiO FH1S comes with Hybrid Drivers. It comes with Knowles 33518 Balanced armature + 13.6mm Dynamic driver.

Are FiiO FH1S earphones easy to drive? Could they be drived by cellphones?

The FH1S has low impedance yet high sensitivity. With 106dB sensitivity, it can be easily driven by even ordinary phones.

How is the overall fit of FiiO FH1S?

The FiiO FH1S comes with an in-ear design which gives a secure fit. Also the lightweight design of FH1S makes them comfortable to use for long hours.

Does FiiO FH1S have a remote and mic?

No, the FiiO FH1S believes in minimalism. Also, what is a remote when compared to the gorgeous sound it offers

How to choose the right ear tips for FiiO FH1S?

The size of the sound tube of the FH1S is 5.8mm, so you can select ear tips whose inner diameter is between 4 to 5mm.

What's the material of the FiiO FH1S? 

The shell of the FH1S used transparent PC material. Layered celluloid is also the material of choice for the FH1S’ distinctive faceplate. For every piece of celluloid faceplate is unique, the FH1S is giving an abundant layered look, literally colorful with personality.

Is the FiiO FH1S with detachable cable? What's the connector of it? 

The cable of the FH1S is detachable. It is structured with 0.78mm 2-pin connectors.

What is the FiiO FH1S sound tuning style? What type of music is it suitable for? 

The FH1S is a newly developed earphone that takes as a base the original FiiO FH1, itself highly acclaimed by Smar Tone in the audio community, and further improves the sound to greater heights. Compared to the FH1, the FH1S has a bigger and improved dynamic driver combined with a Knowles balanced armature driver for a popular-oriented style. Easy to drive, it is suitable for entry-level enthusiasts and average people with truly deep and revealing bass, astonishingly clear mids, and high resolution treble.

How to exchange the headphone cable for the FH1s?

First, standard cables with 0.78mm 2-pin connectors are a must. When attaching or detaching the cable, remember to keep the earphone and the cable aligned in a straight line with the left and right sides connected correspondingly.

Super LightweightDesign



DESCRIPTION


EQUIPPED WITH THE ALL-NEW ULTRA-LINEAR DYNAMIC DRIVERS FOR EXCEPTIONAL AUDIO


The team of acoustic engineers at Moondrop have spent over two years in research and development for the all-new ULT (Ultra Linear Technology) Super Linear Dynamic Driver for the KATO. This newly engineered driver is a 10mm driver unit that features a DLC (Diamond-Like Carbon) composite diaphragm coil. The driver features a composite magnetic circuit that creates a powerful magnetic force inside the cavity allowing for swift movement of the driver coil. It also has a larger brass cavity, an imported CCAW coil, and a high-frequency waveguide system to provide nothing else but exceptional sound.
3RD GEN DLC COMPOSITE DIAPHRAGM WORKING IN CONJUNCTION WITH ULT DRIVERS


The Moondrop KATO is equipped with the latest technology in the audio domain. Featuring a 3rd generation DLC (Diamond-Like Carbon) composition diaphragm coil, this diaphragm is made using three materials with different characteristics to form various parts of the diaphragm. It has high rigidity, a high damping coefficient, and is extremely lightweight. Its comprehensive acoustic performance even exceeds that of a beryllium diaphragm. This in conjunction with the ULT drivers delivers precise audio reproduction.FEATURING THE NEW 3RD GEN ACOUSTIC FILTER AND A INTERCHANGEABLE EAR NOZZLE


The Moondrop KATO features some of the company’s latest innovations in terms of design and build. Moondrop KATO comes with a brand-new third-generation patented anti-blocking filter integrated on the ear nozzle. It prevents oily ear wax from blocking the filters and is more conducive to mid and high-frequency sound. In addition to this, Moondrop has designed KATO with a replaceable ear nozzle design. They have included two sets of sound nozzles in the package, made with different materials(Steel & Brass). Both the Steel and Brass provide different characteristics to the sound, users can switch between them easily. The nozzle can easily be replaced by a quick-release structure with a screw
PROFESSIONALLY DESIGNED SHELLS TUNED FOLLOWING VDSF TARGET RESPONSE


The team of acoustic engineers at Moondrop have gone to lengths to deliver an accurate sounding earphone. To achieve this the front acoustic cavity of the Moondrop KATO is designed with the help of volume and structure simulated by FEA (Finite Element Analysis simulation). It’s designed in such a manner to maintain a balanced tuning profile with a sound that will complement different genres well. Combined with the high-frequency phase guide components on the driver, the front cavity arrangement in KATO is superior to other so-called special tuning components. The pair is tuned by professional acoustic engineers following the VDSF target response.



EXQUISITELY DESIGNED SHELLS WITH A THREE DIMENSIONAL LOOK


The Moondrop KATO has been designed with utmost precision and delivers a stunning visual aesthetic. Moondrop has designed KATO with a modern design using MIM Stainless Steel material. MIM is a process by which powdered metal is mixed with a binder to form a resin in the desired shape and applying high-temperature sintering to achieve the form. There is a high degree of freedom in moulding the resin into the same shape as the cast, making it possible to achieve a complex internal design even with metal. The earphone shell is cast by the MIM powder metallurgy process. Every section of the surface is made smooth by a manual grinding process.
BUNDLED WITH THE NEWLY DEVELOPED SPRING SILICONE EAR TIPS


The Moondrop KATO features ear tips that are designed from soft silicone for superior comfort and noise isolation. Moondrop KATO comes bundled with the newly developed Spring Tips, which suppresses weak resonance through special diffusion structure and significantly lowers the high-frequency linear distortion caused by nozzle resonance, making the high-frequency timbre more natural. In addition to this, the ear tips offer a snug fit and sit comfortably in the ear canal without being sticky. The ear tips feature a special reinforcing rib support design to prevent bass loss caused by sound leakage.HIGH-QUALITY CABLE WITH 2-PIN CONNECTOR AND GOLD PLATED PINS


The Moondrop KATO comes with a high-quality thick silver-plated copper cable. This cable has been coated with high-permeability mixed material which provides an ultra-low dielectric coefficient. The cable provides smooth signal transmission with low internal resistance ensuring a pure sound output for the users. The cable has a standard 0.78mm 2-pin connector allowing for upgradability and replacement. The pins for the cable have been gold plated to offer a clean audio signal.

DESCRIPTION


SPORTING A COSMIC-INSPIRED SHINY PAINT DESIGN RESEMBLING A GORGEOUS NIGHT SKY


The entire purpose behind the design of the MOONDROP Starfield was to display a deep luminous impression of the night sky. The added layer of glitters resembles stars and the colour alters when viewed from different angles. Even the cables paired with the Starfield come with a layer of glitter on them to complement the overall cosmic-inspired design.A CARBON NANOTUBE ARRAY AND GOLD-PLATED BRASS CHAMBER FOR A LIFE-LIKE REAL SOUND


Merging carbon nanotube arrays and PET membranes, the Strafield features an applied technology for an excellent sonic performance. The 6um (0.006mm) diaphragm used in the Starfield comes with advanced durability while delivering an airy sound and analytical highs. The gold-plated brass inner chamber used in the Starfield increases the air damping of the diaphragm. This allows you to enjoy a balanced sound with a smoother transition across the audio spectrum.A WELL-BALANCED SOUND WITH ENHANCED ACOUSTICS FOR BETTER MUSICALITY


The sound of the Starfield finds its strength from its unique acoustical measurements that deliver an enhanced frequency response and ultra-low level distortion. Taking inspiration from the flagship KXXS, the Starfield offers warmer and softer timbre. However, the sound of the Starfield is unique with the focus on a subtle and detailed sound. It finds the right balance between neutrality and musicality. The magnet structure used in the Starfield is paired with a Daikoku CCAW coil that produces a dynamic range and an optimum transient response. This is where the Starfield gets its analytical and lively sound.WITH 24AWG OFC LITZ CABLE AND A 0.78MM 2PIN SOCKET FOR SEAMLESS CONNECTIVITY


Maintaining the purity and intricacies of the dynamic sound, the MOONDROP Starfield sports a 24AWG OFC Litz copper cable. To go with the overall theme of the Starfield, glitters have been added to the outer insulation of the cable. The Starfield comes with a standard 0.78mm 2pin socket. You can always replace these cables to get a more personalised music listening experience.

DESCRIPTION


HIGH-GRADE MATERIALS DRIVING HIGH-RESOLUTION SOUND


Featuring a flexible yet highly rigid beryllium-plated polyurethane diaphragm, the Moondrop SSP (Super Spaceship Pulse), delivers high-resolution sound performance. This diaphragm with a high damping factor is paired with an ultra-lightweight CCAW low impedance coil and an N52 external magnet circuit.
A BASS ENHANCED NATURAL SOUND FOR AN ENERGETIC LISTENING EXPERIENCE


While the overall sound signature of the Moondrop SSP remains neutral, the bass is slightly enhanced for a pleasant listening experience. This enhancement is done with respect to the Diffuse field Head-Related Transfer Function (HRTF) and does not affect the soundstage. Materials used to change the density of the 4 dampers of this headphone results in a natural yet energetic sound.
COMPACT IN-EAR MONITORS DESIGNED FOR TOTAL COMFORT & DURABILITY


Featuring compact transducers and integrated internal structure, the Moondrop SSP sports a simple design. The IEMs are designed to offer a comfortable in-ear fit for security and optimum music listening. These in-ear monitors are carved out of single casted amorphous metal alloy for unrivalled sturdiness, high tensile strength and stability.


AN ALL-NEW ANTI-CLOGGING FILTER FOR INTERFERENCE-FREE LISTENING


Precisely controlled frequency response is what helps the Moondrop SSP to deliver the sonic performance it does. IEMs often face the risk of vapour or earwax contaminating inner damping but not with the Moondrop SSP. With an all-new triple-layer anti-clogging filter, the Moondrop SSP is free of such clogging issues which result in volume imbalance.

DESCRIPTION


AIMED SOLELY AT AUTHENTIC REPRODUCTION OF STUDIO SOUND


These high-quality in-ear monitors from Moondrop are designed meticulously to stay true to the original studio recording. Producing a pure and uncoloured sound where everything from bass to treble sounds natural and authentic.
OFFERING NATURALLY BALANCED SOUND WITH AN EXTENDED SOUNDSTAGE


By reproducing a sound with flat bass and mid-high response, the Moondrop SSR offers a studio-like music listening experience. Inspired by canonized "Spaceship", the Moondrop SSR is designed to reproduce natural timbre and soundstage.BERYLLIUM-PLATED POLYURETHANE DIAPHRAGM DRIVING HIGH-RESOLUTION SOUND


Featuring a flexible yet highly rigid beryllium-plated polyurethane diaphragm, the Moondrop SSR (Super Spaceship Reference), delivers high-resolution sound performance. This diaphragm with a high damping factor is paired with an ultra-lightweight CCAW low impedance coil and an N52 external magnet circuit.
THICK SILVER-PLATED OPTICAL FIBER CABLE FOR A DETAILED BALANCED SOUND


Powerful IEMs need powerful cables. With standard 0.78mm 2pin connectors and a cable made of silver "thick plated" Optical Fiber Cable, the Moondrop SSR delivers exceptional sound. This transparent and elastically wrapped cable is upgradeable too. You can either replace this cable with an upgrade cable or a Bluetooth cable based on your preference.AN ANTI-CLOGGING FILTER FOR INTERFERENCE-FREE MUSIC LISTENING

DESCRIPTION


A FRESH NEW DESIGN FOR A MUSIC LISTENING EXPERIENCE LIKE NEVER BEFORE


Aria was once a very popular in-ear monitor from Moondrop before it got discontinued. This popular IEM is now making a comeback with a bang featuring an all-new elegant design. Combining details, transparency and openness, the design of the Moondrop Aria offers the best of beauty and comfort.
LCP DIAPHRAGM, DUAL-CAVITY DYNAMIC DRIVER FOR A DETAILED AND NATURAL SOUND


Featuring a 10mm dual-cavity dynamic driver, N52 neodymium internal magnetic circuit along with a Liquid Crystal Polymer (LCP) LCD diaphragm, the Moondrop Aria offers high-end performance. This configuration delivers exceptional transient response along with a high resolution and detailed sound output. Enjoy an excellently balanced response with brass cavity's volume control. These IEMs have an imported Daikoku-φ0.035mm CCAW voice coil which makes your music sound more transparent and natural.



UNRIVALLED FREQUENCY RESPONSE FOR EXCELLENT RECORDING PERFORMANCE


The Aria sports a composite sound cavity, multiple tuning holes, and multiple acoustic damping ensuring precise frequency response and excellent sonic performance of the driver unit. In compliance with the HRTF (head-related transfer function) and room response function, the frequency response of the Aria is optimized for modern recording. With an extended vertical sound field and ample atmosphere, the Moondrop Aria is a perfect IEM for excellent recording performance. The high-frequency phase interference often causes distortion and to make sure that doesn't happen, the Aria has a newly designed high-frequency phase waveguide making treble more delicate and natural.INTRICATE ERGONOMIC DESIGN AND AN UPGRADEABLE SILVER-PLATED CABLE


The high-grade metal cavity of the Moondrop Aria is a result of complex processes including Metal injection, moulding CNC carved processing and matte metal spray. These ergonomically and aesthetically designed IEMs are an elegant and moving piece of art. The Moondrop Aria is paired with a replaceable silver-plated and nylon braided cable. It has a universal 0.78 2-pin interface. You can always replace this cable with a cable-with-mic, a Bluetooth cable or a high-grade balanced cable for even better sound. These earphones come with a patented anti-clogging filter to keep the nozzle clean.

Chi-Fi Excellence

Ideal forTaking Calls
6mm DynamicDrivers
Works withAndroid & iOS



 

Super LightweightDesign



DESCRIPTION


UNINTERRUPTED MUSIC LISTENING WITH FULLY ENCLOSED FRONT CAVITY DESIGN


Moondrop Quarks earphones feature a unique fully enclosed front cavity design. This design implementation helps in reducing external noises and gives the user a high level of noise isolation. Due to this unique design, users will be able to listen and enjoy music undisturbed even in noisy places. This design also provides a comfortable fit to the users for longer listening sessions.RICH, FULL SOUND WITH SPECIALLY TUNED 6mm MICRO DYNAMIC DRIVER


Moondrop Quarks earphone features a 6mm micro dynamic driver that is highly capable of sound reproduction. This driver benefits from an external N52 neodymium magnetic architecture, a high-quality polymer diaphragm coil, and an imported CCAW voice coil. This provides excellent dynamics and lowers nonlinear distortion. The drivers are specially designed and tuned for a neutral tone and are easy to drive. It reproduces a rich sound with balanced frequency response. These earphones are sure to suit your music with their high-resolution clarity.TUNED FOLLOWING THE HEAD RELATED TRANSFER FUNCTION (HRTF) FREQUENCY RESPONSE CURVE


The Moondrop Quarks earphones have been specifically tuned by experts at the company. The tuning adjustment took over two years to achieve their preferred sound signature - which is a neutral & natural sounding tuning following the Head Related Transfer Function (HRTF) frequency response curve. The earphones have a wide frequency response range of 4Hz-43kHz allowing you to enjoy music with clarity.


PATENTED SOUND DAMPING STRUCTURE WITH DOUBLE-DAMPING


Moondrop Quarks earphones adopt the second generation patented anti-blocking sound damping structure in order to maintain high-resolution performance. This also helps in improving the durability of the earphones and reduces blockage caused in the nozzle area due to earwax buildup. Moondrop has designed a double-damping structure using two different materials with completely different acoustic resistance to filter different frequencies. This enhances the sound by greatly eliminating treble ringing and making the sound natural and enjoyable.INDUSTRIAL DESIGN WITH TRANSPARENT SHELL


Moondrop Quarks earphones feature a unique structural design that is revealing. The shells of the earphones are fully transparent and are compact in size for a comfortable wearing experience. The transparent cavity allows for a clear view of the driver and acoustic structure. This is truly an exquisite and unique approach to earphone design.

Super LightweightDesign

 I wouldn't be entirely wrong if I said they are bound to transport you out of this world. The compact form factor makes for long listening sessions. I'd probably pair these with a portable amplifier to drive them to their optimum.

PRAVEEN KAMATH
Headphone Guru 



About PRAVEEN KAMATH
Praveen, our Headphone Zone is an audio connoisseur and staunch Meze fanboy. He loves the RAI Penta and the Empyrean, equally. When not writing about, thinking about or listening to music: He's an avid beerologist too and staunchly believes that the combination of both beats every music setup out there! You'll often find him listening to The Weeknd, The Score and The Script.DESCRIPTION


FEATURING AN ALL-NEW SEMI-DEEP IN-EAR DESIGN FOR AN IMPROVED SOUND


With one-of-its-kind semi in-ear design, the MOONDROP Spaceship delivers a more natural high-frequency performance and a reduced HF attenuation and resonance. This semi in-ear design offers a comfortable wearing experience along with better restrain of the HF performance in comparison to regular earphones.METICULOUSLY TESTED BALANCED SOUND FOR SONIC EXCELLENCE


After a four-month-long sample adjustment process, MOONDROP came up with a VDSF Target Response based index design and a diaphragm design based on the auditory feedback of multiple users. The SPACESHIP is an entry-level in-ear earphone but goes way beyond its limits to display MOONDROP's pursuit of sound.



A SIMPLE YET DURABLE DESIGN WITH AN ECM MICROPHONE AND A PLAYBACK CONTROL BUTTON


You get to experience the best possible audio input with a back-pole ECM microphone used in the MOONDROP SPACESHIP. These in-ear earphones carry out a signal isolation process to ensure that the sound quality is not lost due to the addition of a microphone. A dedicated button in the cable allows you to answer calls, play/pause your music and to skip between tracks. These earphones are designed to be compatible with most Android, iOS smartphones and PCs. Kindly note that the earphones have no volume control buttons and might have compatibility issues with some mobile phones

DESCRIPTION


THE PINNACLE OF CUTTING-EDGE JAPANESE ENGINEERING


Final makes use of high precision Japanese engineering with focus on finesse and accuracy. Adopting cutting edge technology with high attention to detail and the highest quality of audio design, Final has carved a name for itself amongst audiophiles winning multiple awards over the years.      CREATING VALUABLE ANTIQUES, NOT JUST PRODUCTS


The team at Final strongly believes in creating earphones and headphones that are highly revered by people. Final earphones, like Swiss wristwatches and German Cars must be built to last forever and used as valuable antiques. The result of such careful consideration is a long-lasting, rational & emotionally valuable asset with the best sound quality and best design.



CRAFTED IN KAWASAKI, JAPAN SINCE 1974


At the Final factory, the team of audio designers are dedicated to innovating audio products through research. Unlike other OEM manufacturers, they believe in designing their products in-house. This facilitates internal feedback between various teams and departments, encouraging the process for developing a long lasting product.



A PROUD SHOWCASE OF JAPANESE HERITAGE AND CRAFTSMANSHIP


Final has a state-of-the-art company-owned “Final Store” located in Tokyo, Japan. This is open to all music lovers and audio enthusiasts to come in and experience Final’s range of headphones & earphones. The store proudly showcases their Japanese heritage and cultural artefacts in the form of Samurai suits. This represents Final's deep respect for the audio purist.
SINGLE BALANCED ARMATURE DRIVER DELIVERING PRECISE AUDIO


The team at Final spared no effort in terms of engineering and designing the B2. This in-ear monitor features a new and redesigned driver setup that delivers high-quality, precise sound. The B2 features a single balanced armature driver to deliver a natural sound that’s crisp and clear. The implementation of this driver enabled a particular emphasis on proximity of sound and sense of reality. With this balanced armature driver setup, you experience vocals in a manner that the respiration of the singer can be felt. It is also capable of reproducing the nuance and inflexion of the delicate sound of each musical instrument.
AWARD WINNING DESIGN FOR LIFELONG USE WITH REPAIRABLE CONSTRUCTION


The B2 from Final is designed with modular elements which allow disassembly and easy repairs. This design has been implemented keeping in mind the factor of being able to use the IEM’s for a long time and if any issue arises, can solve it with ease. The B2 features a design where the front and rear pieces of the housing shell are detachable making it easy to open and inspect the earphone for any issue. This design allows for repairs and extends the lifetime of the earphones. The housing components can be disassembled with screws ensuring that the product can be used for many years after purchase. With this future proof design and the technology embedded in the Final B2, they have been awarded at the VGP 2019 SUMMER awards in Japan.
ERGONOMICALLY DESIGNED CHASSIS OFFERING A CUSTOMISED WEARING EXPERIENCE


The design for the chassis of the Final B2 has been completely reimagined and re-engineered to offer utmost comfort. Unlike most IEMs on the market, which are designed with an ergonomic shape that rests heavily on the ear and silicone ear tips to keep them in place, the B2 limits the area that comes in contact with the ear, aiming to achieve a sense of fit with no feeling of oppression. The featured chassis is designed with 2 holding positions and 1 assisting position to offer a secure fit. In simpler words, it limits the amount of contact between the housing and the ear. This makes it comfortable and ensures a stable fit for a variety of people.
DURABLE METAL INJECTION MOULDING STAINLESS STEEL HOUSING


The Final B2 is made with premium quality materials and the utmost attention to detail for preferable results. The housing of the B2 is made of Metal Injection Moulding stainless steel with a matt finish instead of traditional aluminium. MIM is a process by which powdered metal is mixed with a binder to form a resin in the desired shape and applying high-temperature sintering to achieve the form. There is a high degree of freedom in moulding the resin into the same shape as the cast, making it possible to achieve a complex internal design even with metal. This decision was implemented as stainless steel is highly resistant to magnetism and has a high specific gravity, favourable for making the IEMs. These design decisions and selected materials are contributing elements enhancing the sound quality of the earphones.



HIGH-QUALITY ORIGINAL OFC CABLE WITH MMCX CONNECTOR


Final B2 comes with an original OFC cable that provides a wide soundstage. These cables are developed to deliver fast signal transmission. The outer layer is coated with maximum flexibility. You will experience surprising flexibility that both makes the cable extremely easy to use as well as reducing the likelihood of microphonics. In addition, the earphones feature an MMCX plug and the 3.5mm mini-plug which are gold plated for better transmission. This durable cable and connector make connecting to a source device easy and seamless.



BUNDLED WITH HIGH-QUALITY EAR HOOKS FOR ELIMINATING TOUCH NOISE


The Final B2 comes bundled with premium quality ear hooks that are carefully designed to fit everyone. The team at Final, considered the key aspects to designing an ear hook that is comfortable to wear and discovered a form that was smaller than most existing ear hooks and that didn't utilise metal or resin wires. This decision allowed for a simmer ear hook and one that feels premium to the touch, allowing the user to wear the earphones for extended periods and enjoy their music. This design drastically suppresses touch noise when the connecting cable touches the body.



HIGH-QUALITY SILICONE EAR-TIPS AND CASE INCLUDED


The ear tips for the Final B2 have been designed from soft silicone for superior comfort and noise isolation. These come in 5 sizes and the right and left earbuds have different coloured markings for easy recognisability and the different sizes also ensure that the sound is transmitted directly to the eardrum. Two types of silicon differing in rigidity are employed for the sound conduit and for the earbud that comes into contact with the user’s ear. The silicon used for the sound conduit is more rigid than that used for the earbud, and having groove processing applied to it, combines both strength and flexibility. These earphones also come bundled with a silicone carry case. With this silicon carry case, the cables can be rolled up and stored easily. The earphones themselves are gently secured using thin dome-shaped silicon covers making them perfect to carry along with you.



ENGINEERED TO SOUND STUNNING WITH REGULAR USE


The Final B2 comes embedded with driver units with a diaphragm attached to a voice coil and adhesive agent. With audio signals flowing, the diaphragm moves in minute increments along with the voice coil allowing the sound to be produced. Over time, the diaphragm moves efficiently and the sound changes or ‘ages’. The B2 has a small aperture, and so an extended period is necessary for changes through ageing to become noticeable. When used for over 150-200 hours, it should feel as though the sound has become stable. Favourable outcomes can be obtained through the ageing of the product, by listening to the music you normally listen to at a volume you usually listen to.

What is the warranty period on the Final B2 and how do I claim warranty?

The warranty period on Final B2 is for 1 year. Read more information Click here.

What is the sound signature in the Final B2?

The Final B2 comes with a Balanced Sound Signature that delivers great clarity over the mids with punchy bass. The B2 is a perfect fit if you like listening to all kinds of genres.

How many drivers does the Final B2 come with?

The Final B2 comes with 1 Balanced Armature Driver.

Will the Final B2 work with my smartphone?

Yes! Final B2 is compatible to work with both Android and iOS.

How is the overall fit of Final B2?

The Final B2 comes with an in-ear design which gives a secure fit. Also the lightweight design of B2 makes them comfortable to use for long hours.

Does Final B2 have a remote and mic?

No, the Final B2 believes in minimalism. Also, what is a remote when compared to the gorgeous sound it offers

Does the Final B2 come with detachable cables?

Yes, the cables are indeed detachable. Making for easy storage and convenient for whenever you want to replace or upgrade cables.

What materials are used to make Final B2 earphones?

Final B2 is made with premium quality materials. The housing of the B2 is made of Metal Injection Moulding stainless steel with a mirror-finish instead of traditional aluminium.

Does Final B2 come with a carry case?

Yes Final B2 does come with a silicon carry case. Did you just smile?

Are the cables on the Final B2 replaceable?

Yes, the Final B2 comes with replaceable MMCX cables.


USER MANUAL
HOW TO WEAR THE EARPHONES
This product is an earphone that is hung over the ear. The transmission of touch noise to the ear can be prevented by placing the cable on the ear to achieve a comfortable fit.
1. Confirm the R and L marks on the inside of the chassis. R is right, and L is left.
2. Run the cable toward the front from behind the ear and insert the earpiece of the earphone into the ear.
3. If it is difficult to fit the earphone into the cavity of the concha, try to insert the earphone while pulling back and somewhat upward on the ear lobe.
● If the cable does not fit on the back of the ear, please use the ear hook accessory.● If the fit is too loose, try changing the size of the sleeve. In some cases, the size of the left and right earpieces may be different.


Warranty & Media Reviews
1 Year Warranty
Don't sweat it, this Final B2 comes with a 1 year warranty from Final that covers manufacturing defects. All products featured on Headphone Zone are backed by an original manufacturer's warranty. click here about Final's warranty in India.Life Style

"I love the Final B2. I’ve never heard anything like it. Maybe I’m just surprised about being surprised, but they just might be my new favorite IEM in their price range."

"the Final B2 has a stylish, mature look, with an easy and comfortable fit. If you like a nice full midrange with a tuning for voice, you’ll really enjoy the B2."

"The company Final follows a new way with the design and functionality of its new B series In-Ear Monitors. The B2 stands out with its entertaining tuning and mid-focused sound."

HOW TO WEAR THE EARPHONES
Check the left and right with the L (left) and R (right) indications on the side of the housing. In addition, the earpiece that is attached to the main body as standard is R (right) when the shaft color is red. Also, refer to the earpiece swing fit mechanism and adjust the angle so that it fits smoothly in your ear when worn. Hold the body and push it in with a slight twist to attach it to both ears. The sound quality changes greatly depending on the mounting position, so move the main unit three-dimensionally one by one while playing music to adjust it to the most preferable listening position. That is the optimum position (best position). Once you experience it, you can easily align it from the second time.

Raghav Somani is the Founder & CEO of Headphone Zone. E2000, E2000C and E200CS use a more flexible OFC (oxygen-free copper) cable to transmit better audio signal from a device to the earbuds. This design drastically suppresses touch noise when the connecting cable touches the body. It features a Y split point and an L-shaped jack to further solidify the durability. What is the sound signature in the Final E2000?
