DESCRIPTION


HIGH-FIDELITY SOUND WITH ES9219C CHIP CAPABLE OF PLAYING HI-RES FILES


The all-new Shanling UA1 Pro is the latest in line with the popular series of DAC and Amplifiers. UA1 Pro comes equipped with the latest technology and components to deliver pristine sound quality and added features. Shanling UA1 Pro embeds a high-quality audio circuit built around an ESS ES9219C chip. This famous chip incorporates both digital to analog conversion capabilities as well as headphone amplification capabilities and also offering better performance in terms of harmonic distortion. The UA1 Pro is capable of playing high-resolution audio files up to 384kHz / 32bit and even DSD files up to DSD256. The output stage delivers up to 80mW of power at 32 Ohm with a minimal noise level.





EMBEDDED WITH THE LATEST TECH AND A DEDICATED APP FOR QUICK ACCESS


Shanling UA1 Pro offers unmatched sound quality and signal path for artefact free audio. The sound is based on the default 64-level full volume, linear phase fast roll-off filtering, and high gain technology. The sound quality of the UA1 Pro has greatly optimised with the transient response speed giving a sharper and faster dynamic performance. The sense of energy in the mid and low frequencies has also been significantly enhanced. The latest UA1 Pro comes with a dedicated app that supports setting filter settings, gain and other options through Eddict Player APP.









TYPE-C TO 3.5MM CONNECTOR FOR COMPATIBILITY WITH VARIOUS DEVICES


The Shanling UA1 Pro features a USB Type-C to 3.5mm connector that allows it to be paired with many devices. USB Type-C connectivity opens up doors to utilise all the qualities and audio capabilities of the UA 1 pro with a laptop or even a PC as a sound card. UA1 Pro is completely optimised for mobile use, the circuit has been redesigned to maximise the power available for the amplified output while limiting the load on the battery of the source device. This is a suitable solution for extended listening sessions, even on devices with limited battery. The Shanling UA1 Pro is plug and play compatible with Android, Windows and macOS devices allowing you to enjoy your music across devices.









ALUMINIUM BUILD FUSED WITH HIGH-QUALITY COPPER WIRE FOR NOISE-FREE AUDIO


The build quality of the Shanling UA1 Pro is of premium quality using the best materials. The shell of UA1 Pro is made of aluminium, which is processed by CNC milling, electroplating and other processes to make it super durable and lightweight. The wires connecting the UA1 Pro are made of 7 strands with 18 cores of high purity copper wire covered with braid ensuring excellent conductivity and audio transmission. It is securely protected by a robust sheath and has a cotton/silver shield specially designed to limit the capture of high-frequency waves, such as those specifically present near a smartphone, effectively shielding all kinds of interference with almost zero noise output.

portableAmp.product_description:
Chi-Fi Excellence

VolumeControls






 A lot of power even for the most demanding of headphones, an excellent build, the versatility to take it along on the road makes the E10K a yesteryear hero and an all-time favourite






PRAVEEN KAMATH
Headphone Guru 



About PRAVEEN KAMATH
Praveen, our Headphone Zone is an audio connoisseur and staunch Meze fanboy. He loves the RAI Penta and the Empyrean, equally. When not writing about, thinking about or listening to music: He's an avid beerologist too and staunchly believes that the combination of both beats every music setup out there! You'll often find him listening to The Weeknd, The Score and The Script.




DESCRIPTION


UPGRADED WITH AN HIGH QUALITY ADVANCED DAC CHIP AND USB TYPE-C CONNECTIVITY


One of the notable developments in the FiiO E10K-TC is its PCM5102 DAC chip. This chip brings about significant improvements in the functionality of the E10K-TC and improved audio quality without any phase shift or delays. The PCM5102 DAC can handle PCM files up to 32-bit/384kHz, or outputting 192 kHz over coaxial S/PDIF while improving audio quality via a linear internal filter; this also reduces delay, improves internal silence on changing tracks and induces no phase shifts. Now you can connect the E10K-TC to your laptop via its USB Type-C connection, which also provides it with power and offers a better interface with modern devices.










FEATURING AN UPDATED AMPLIFICATION STAGE, BASS BOOST CIRCUIT AND XMOS CHIP


FiiO E10K-TC now comes embedded with an LMH6643 OP-Amp that elevates its driving power exponentially. The FiiO E10K-TC offers an output power of 200mW @32Ω and a USB decoding sample rate of 24 bit / 96kHz with enhanced transient response. Keeping up with the times, the E10K-TC comes embedded with the flagship XMOS XUF208 chip for more efficient USB decoding. This offers USB Audio Class 2.0 and supports up to 32bit/384kHz playback. The E10K-TC is also equipped with a Dual Gain setting that has an optimised low-pass filter along with a selectable Bass Boost circuit that delivers a low noise floor. Taking control of the volume is easy with the volume control knob that offers precise increments or decrements in volume and you can enable the Bass Boost Circuit via the button on the front panel.










HIGHLY DURABLE AND PORTABLE DESIGN WITH A VARIETY OF CONNECTIVITY OPTIONS


The FiiO E10K-TC is compact, portable and more durable than ever before, thanks to its brushed aluminium shell and chassis that allow for portable operation without worry. The E10K-TC connects to your laptop via its USB Type-C connection and offers a variety of connectivity options, including a front-panel 3.5mm headphone jack, a rear-panel 3.5mm line output, and a rear-panel RCA coaxial digital output, which allows you to send your digital audio to another destination. The connectivity options make it easier to connect to other pieces of equipment. These additions are thoughtful and keep in tune with technological advancements.

FAQS

What is the warranty period on the FiiO E10K and how do I claim warranty?

The warranty period on FiiO E10K is for 1 year. Read more information about FiiO's warranty in India.click here.

How to do when the device is malfunctioning, like failing to boot, no sounds when playing music?

[Fail to turn on] When the E10K-TC could not be turned on, please try to reconnect or unplug and plug it off the USB to return to normal performance. [No sounds out, noisy sounds, only one channel can work] The following methods can help you troubleshoot the cause: 1. Reboot the E10K-TC by operating the power on/off knob. 2. Switch input source: such as the adapter cable, USB cable, computer 3. Switch output source: such as headphones, headphone cable  [Water damage] Please shut down the E10K-TC immediately and do not charge it. Store it in a dry place and contact our support team for help

How to use the E10K-TC as a USB DAC for computers?

[Windows system] *Windows system supports USB DAC 2.0 mode: When first connecting, please go to our website to download the DAC driver, and install it as the instruction to enable the USB DAC function. Download link: http://fiio-file.fiio.net/FiiO_USB_DAC_Driver-V4.47.0.zip *The following instruction takes Windows 7 as an example to introduce how to install the USB DAC driver (v4.47.0) on the computer, and use the E10K-TC to play songs: https://forum.fiio.com/note/showNoteContent.do?id=202106181129330797039&tid=17 [MacBook] MacBook does not need to install the driver. Directly choose the E10K-TC as the output device. How to use the FiiO device as USB DAC on MAC: https://forum.fiio.com/note/showNoteContent.do?id=202105191616354037331

Instructions for the Power/Volume knob, GAIN and BASS switch

[Power/Volume Knob] *Turn the Power/Volume knob clockwise until a click sound is heard to turn on the device; keep turning clockwise to increase the volume. *Turn anticlockwise to decrease the volume; turn anticlockwise until a click sound is heard to turn off the device. [GAIN switch] H: Switch to high gain L: Switch to low gain  Choose the gain level based on the earphones you are using. It is suggested to adjust the volume knob between 9 and 3 o'clock. and choose the gain level for your own preference. [BASS switch] Bass boosting: Turn the BASS switch to ON to boost the bass performance. You could turn it on or off based on your personal preference.

Issues regarding the E10K-TC's indicator light

1. After connecting to the computer, if the E10K-TC can work normally but the indicator light keeps off, the light is probably broken. 2. After connecting to the computer, if the indicator light keeps flashing, it is suggested to unplug and plug the USB cable or restart the computer. If the problem still exists, it may be the issue of the E10K-TC. 3. Last but not least, it is suggested to disconnect and reconnect the E10K-TC after quitting the music app.

Can the E10K-TC's headphone, coaxial and line-out output work at the same time?

The E10K-TC supports 3.5mm single-ended headphone, coaxial and line-out output.  (The coaxial can support up to 192k/24bit output.) The E10K-TC's headphone, coaxial and line-out output can work at the same time.

Is the volume of the E10K-TC's coaxial and line-out output adjustable?

The volume of the E10K-TC's coaxial and line-out output cannot be controlled through the volume knob.

Should I disconnect the USB cable if the E10K-TC is not in use for a long time?

The E10K-TC has a power switch (i.e. the volume knob). When the E10K-TC is not in use, you only need to rotate the knob to turn off the E10K-TC yet without having to unplug the USB cable.

Can I connect the E10K-TC to an iOS or Android device?

The port of the E10K-TC is a combo of both power supply and data transfer, which is designed for desktop computers or laptops. It is not recommended to connect it to mobile devices.

What are the differences between the New K3 and E10K-TC? How to choose the right one?

1. Both of them are portable desktop DAC and headphone amplifier. 2. In terms of the USB Audio class, both of them support PCM up to 384kHz/32bit. The difference is that the New K3 also supports native decoding up to DSD256, while the E10K-TC does not support DSD. 3. The New K3 features a 2.5mm balanced output port, while the E10K-TC only has a 3.5mm single-ended output port. 4. The E10K-TC is more cost-effective. In short, for balanced output and DSD requirements, the New K3 will be more appropriate, while single-ended output and non-DSD decoding can take the E10K-TC as a choice.

DESCRIPTION


HIGH-PERFORMANCE AUDIO CHIPS OFFERING PCM AND DSD SUPPORT


iBasso DC05 is part of a new generation of headphone Amp/DAC focusing on High Definition audio. The iBasso DC05 features dual ES9219C high-performance audio chips. These audio chips are capable of decoding PCM 32bit/384kHz and DSD256 natively. This gives you the freedom to play the highest quality of files, allowing you to enjoy rich and precise audio, enriching the listening experience.









ARTEFACT FREE AUDIO TRANSMISSION WITH QUAD DAC+ TECHNOLOGY


iBasso DC05 has been engineered to give you the best sound reproduction. To achieve this the device embeds a pair of 32bit DAC ES9219C chips and they integrate the Quad DAC+ technology as well as a headphone amplifier and a dynamic range enhancement (DRE). The combination of Quad DAC+, Time Domain Jitter Eliminator and HyperStream III architecture delivers a dynamic range of 121dB and an excellent THD+N level.





POWERFUL OUTPUT CAPABILITY WITH PRECISE VOLUME ADJUSTMENT


The iBasso DC05 adapter has a powerful output voltage of up to 2Vrms (300Ω load) and 1.73Vrms (32Ω load) load. It produces a power of up to 80mW at 32 Ohms load which is more than enough to power your IEMs with ease. iBasso has also developed a volume control application that uses the UAC2.0 protocol to enable 64-step volume control by hardware while lowering the noise floor and providing much better audio performance.








EASY TO CARRY DESIGN FUSED WITH TYPE-C TO 3.5MM CONNECTOR


iBasso DC05 is a portable device with a small footprint, making it easy to carry with you. Alongside being compact, the iBasso DC05 can also connect to most smartphones with a USB Type-C connector and offers plug and play support. That means you need to plug in and start enjoying your music, with no hassle of drivers or any other obstruction. It will allow you to enjoy your music in very high quality anywhere. The USB Type-C connection terminates to a 3.5mm single-ended connector to connect your headphones or IEMs.

DESCRIPTION


SIZE ISN'T A PROBLEM IF YOU'RE GOOD AT IT


Shanling's iconic minimalistic design is evident in its Bluetooth amplifier — The UP4. It’s a combination of a beautiful aluminium frame and 2.5D glass panels that adds elegance. You can connect your Shanling UP4 to just about any device for the high-end audio quality.









OFFERS HI-RES AUDIO, WIRED OR WIRELESS


The Shanling UP4 enjoys added credibility with the 'Hi-Res Audio' and 'Hi-Res Wireless Audio' certification from the Japan Audio Society. You can trust it with high-resolution music.









USES APTX, APTX HD, LDAC, LHDC FOR HI-RES SEAMLESS AUDIO REPRODUCTION


The UP4 houses a CSR8675 Bluetooth chip. This chip ensures stable connectivity along with lower latency and high resistance to any disturbance. With just one touch you can pair it with any device that supports NFC. It also supports LDAC, HWA, LHDC and aptX HD which reproduces high-res audio even when streaming audio wirelessly. Stay connected! 










HOUSES A DUAL DAC FOR FLAWLESS HI-RES WIRED AUDIO


If you are using your Shanling UP4 with a 2.5mm jack or even with the standard 3.5 mm jack output, you won't miss on the powerful sound output. Thanks to the Dual-DAC mode, it employs two ESS Sabre ES9218P audio chips which facilitate crystal-clear, high-resolution sound output along with power efficiency.








GAIN AND DIGITAL FILTER OPTIONS TO TWEAK YOUR MUSIC LISTENING EXPERIENCE


Personalize your music with the dedicated mode button. This button has gain and digital filter settings which will slightly modify your overall music according to your preferences. Need an external sound card for your laptop? Connect Shanling UP4 to your laptop or computer as a USB DAC/AMP using nothing but just a USB-C connecter cable.





TOP NOTCH NOISE CANCELLATION TECH FOR CLEARER CALLS


You can even make & take calls with the Shanling UP4. This is all thanks to the Knowles SiSonic microphone and latest 8th generation cVc noise cancellation tech. Your calls are now clearer with minimal background noise.





SHANLING'S CONTROLLER APP TO TAKE ABSOLTUE CONTROL OF YOUR UP4


Take your Shanling UP4's wirelessness up a notch with the Shanling Controller. This nifty app lets you control playback as well as set-up your UP4. You also get added functionality like equalizer, filter & gain support, OTA updates and more.Get the Shanling Controller App here.

What is the battery life like?

The Shanling - UP4 has a 15-hour (single ended) and 10-hours (balanced) battery life. Enough to last the day and beyond.

What do you mean by aptX and AAC? Do they really make my music sound different?

AAC and aptX are Bluetooth codecs that improve the quality of audio that is being transferred wirelessly. To know more, check out this article on Bluetooth codecs.

Does this Bluetooth Amplifier come with any balanced outputs?

Yes, the Shanling - UP4 does come with a 2.5mm balanced output.

Is this just an Bluetooth amplifier or DAC/AMP?

The Shanling UP4 is a Bluetooth amplifier that comes with dual DAC chips for better sound and more power.

What Bluetooth version does it support?

The Shanling UP4 comes with the latest Bluetooth version 5.0.

Can it be used as a digital transport for external DAC?

Yes, you can connect the UP4 to your computer to use it as a DAC/AMP, acting as a external sound card.

Does it support Hi-Res audio?

Yes, it does support Hi-Res audio and can be trusted for your source for all the hi-res music collection you have.

What all Bluetooth codecs does this player support?

It supports HWA, LDAC, aptX HD, aptX, AAC & SBC to ensure there are no lags while playing through Bluetooth.

What is the difference between Shanling UP2 and UP4?

The Shanling UP4 comes with dual DAC chips and is more powerful in terms of amplification than UP2. Also, not to forget the balanced 2.5mm balanced output you get on UP4.

What is the Shanling Companion App?

Shanling Controller is the new app, developed as a companion app for use with the Shanling UP2 and UP4 Bluetooth amplifiers. It offers access to a range of useful settings, such as channel balance and Bluetooth codecs.

How to download the new companion app?

At the current time app is available only for Android devices. .apk file is included in the firmware update package. Download the Shanling Controller app from Play Store.

portableAmp.product_description:
Chi-Fi Excellence





1 Year ofWarranty





Ideal forTaking Calls





Ideal forAudiophiles

Bluetooth with LDACaptX LL, aptX HD & AAC

Pair with Laptop via USB C





ESS Sabre ES9219C Dual DAC Chip





Upto 240mW @ 32ΩPower Output





Battery Capacity of550 mAh



DESCRIPTION


UPGRADE TO HIGH-RES SOUND TODAY WITH THE NEW FIIO BTR5 2021


Make your Bluetooth device a part of the High-Res wireless set up with the FiiO BTR5 2021. With Bluetooth 5.0, the BTR5 extends support to high-quality Bluetooth codecs like AAC, SBC, AptX, AptX LL, AptX HD, and LDAC up to 96 kHz. So if you are on the lookout for high-end audiophile setups, the FiiO BTR5 is a perfect option for you to access excellent sound using your current device.





UPGRADED WITH MQA PROTOCOL SUPPORT WITH FULL 16X DECODING


The FiiO BTR5 2021 has been upgraded to offer maximum audio playback capability. A new addition to the updated BTR5 2021 is support for MQA protocol with decoding and rendering capability. This allows for high-resolution, master-level sound quality even in reasonably sized files. FiiO BTR5 2021 supports up to 16X MQA decoding with applicable music apps to enjoy music in life-like quality.








UNCOMPROMISED SOUND QUALITY WITH TWO ES9219C AND XMOS XUF208 CHIPS


The core of the FiiO BTR5 2021 has been renewed with two ESS SABRE ES9219C DAC chips with better decoding performance than the previous generation, a higher signal-to-noise ratio, and lower power consumption. To further solidify the audio architecture the BTR5 2021 has utilised an XMOS XUF208 control chip. With this chip, the BTR5 2021 is capable of asynchronous audio decoding and can decode up to 384kHz sampling rate and native DSD in USB2.0 and Asynchronous USB DAC supports 384kHz sampling rate and DSD256 natively.








EFFICIENT POWER MANAGEMENT WITH QUALCOMM CSRS8675 CHIP


The biggest perk of integrating and updating the Qualcomm CSRS8675 into the FiiO BTR5 2021 is low-power consumption and improved audio capabilities. This chip allows BTR5 2021 to support 24-bit and 120Mhz DSP audio processing for efficient Bluetooth decoding. You can use the BTR5 2021 for watching videos, playing games or listening to music and be assured of outstanding sound quality.





FPGA CLOCK AND DUAL CRYSTAL OSCILLATOR OFFERING HIGH-FIDELITY AUDIO


FiiO BTR5 2021 comes embedded with a precision FPGA clock and this is responsible for the transmission and reception of Bluetooth and USB digital audio signals as well as clock management. In the BTR5 2021, after the Bluetooth signal is processed through the FPGA, jitter is reduced and signal stability is improved, completely solving the problem of different clock rates between the different components. With the addition of a dedicated FPGA, the 45.1584/49.152MHz dual crystal oscillators can more accurately reproduce audio signals under various sampling rates during Bluetooth and USB decoding.









EXPERIENCE DETAILED SOUND AND CONVENIENCE WITH DUAL OUTPUT CONNECTORS


To offer greater power and detailed resolution, the FiiO BTR5 2021 features both 2.5mm balanced and 3.5mm single-ended outputs. In its balanced audio architecture, each channel is driven separately with its own DAC and amplifier, allowing the BTR5 2021 to bring a purer sound with unmatched finesse and balance. This truly balanced audio architecture extends pure balanced sound. Kindly note that when 3.5mm and 2.5mm outputs are inserted simultaneously only the 3.5mm port will provide sound to ensure that the BTR5 functions normally.





EQUIPPED WITH A CRISP OLED SCREEN FUSED INTO A DURABLE ALUMINIUM BODY


The crisp and clear 0.49 inch 64x32 resolution OLED screen is among the best features of the FiiO BTR5 2021. It is one screen that displays everything, including info about pairing, connection, call status, power status, encoding format and volume. It also allows you to view and modify the charging status, car mode, filters and EQ. Similar to some of the latest smartphones, the FiiO BTR5 2021 sports a durable aluminium body with curved glass and an oleophobic layer on the top which gives it a smooth and fingerprint-resistant body.








9+ HOURS OF BATTERY LIFE AND CVC NOISE-CANCELLING MICROPHONES FOR CALLS


Fully charge the built-in 550mAh battery of your FiiO BTR5 2021 in just 1.5 hours. Once it's charged completely you can use it for as long as 9 hours. With built-in dual omnidirectional high-sensitivity microphones, you can use a headset like the CTIA, which comes with an external microphone. When using either set of microphones, you can benefit from CVC 8.0 noise cancellation technology, which intelligently adjusts microphone gain and effectively suppresses background noise for crystal clear calls.





NFC ENABLED DEVICE WITH ADAPTIVE BATTERY SAVING AND USAGE MODE FOR CONVENIENCE


When you connect the BTR5 2021 to your headphones or phone, It remembers your preferred volume level, saving you effort and time. In iOS devices, you can even view the battery percentage right from the widget. Smart enough to detect the kind of headphone you are using, the FiiO BTR5 2021 adjusts its output once you insert the headphone. The moment you remove the headphone, the BTR5 is smart enough to pause the music and to go into low power consumption mode saving battery life. When a USB connection is detected with the BTR5 2021, it will automatically prompt you to turn on "USB Audio Adapter" mode, which turns off charging to the BTR5 2021 and allows you to use it as an audio dongle. You can connect to compatible devices using NFC one-touch connectivity. If you are using the BTR5 in the car mode, the BTR5 turns on and off depending on the car.





FEATURES EASY TO USE BUTTONS & SUPPORT TO FIIO'S MUSIC APP FOR PERSONALISATION


Pairing, play, pause, accept calls, hang up calls and open voice assistant using the dedicated buttons on the FiiO BTR5 2021. Once you've disconnected your paired devices via Bluetooth, you can press the Bluetooth reconnect button to reconnect with the device again. Just double-tap the dedicated button to activate your voice assistant. You can change how your BTR5 2021 sounds using the FiiO Music App and remotely control channel balance, select from 4 DAC lowpass filters or adjust the sound on a 10 band equaliser. Kindly note that the equaliser functionality does not work in the LDAC. In the box, you get a 360° of all-around protection case along with a detachable back clip and a USB Type-C to Type-C cable.

FAQs

What is the warranty like and who should I contact?

FiiO offers a one year warranty. If you need to claim warranty, you can contact us. We are quite friendly people, just sayin. You can read more about warranty here.

Is this just an Bluetooth amplifier or DAC/AMP? 

The FiiO BTR5 2021 is a Bluetooth amplifier that comes with dual ESS Sabre ES9218P DAC chip for better sound and more power.

Can it be used as a digital transport for external DAC? 

Yes, you can connect the FiiO BTR5 2021 to your computer to use it as a DAC/AMP, acting as a external sound card.

What are the battery capacity and battery life of the BTR5 2021? 

The BTR5 2021 has a high-performance lithium polymer battery with 550mAh battery capacity and about 9 hours of battery life (tested under ACC codec and low gain). It takes only about 1.5 hours for a full charge (tested under 3.5mm output and AAC codec).

What are the main differences between BTR5 2021 and BTR5?

1. The BTR5 2021 adopts a brand new ES9219C DAC, which has stronger decoding ability and better performance which provides high SNR while ensuring low power consumption. 2. Added MQA support, which can unfold the MQA tracks on the mobile phone. When working with music applications supporting MQA, it can achieve 16x MQA unfolding. 3. The BTR5 2021 supports switching to the "USB Audio Adapter mode" (USB dongle) by just one press. When a USB connection is detected the BTR5 2021, it will automatically prompt you to turn on "USB Audio Adapter" mode, which turns off charging to the BTR5 2021 and allows you to use it as an audio dongle for your phone or other devices. Please press any button in 15s when the prompt menu jumps out. If there is no operation within 15 seconds, the charging function will stay on. (The pop-up menu can also be closed through the FiiO Control App.) 4. A short skin-friendly silicone Type-C to Type-C cable is added to the accessory list. 5. The package box is newly designed in a science fiction style, and the back panel adds an MQA logo. 6. The software filters have been reduced from 6 to 2 (since the DAC has added MQA support, we canceled the internal filter).

How to use the BTR5 2021 as a USB DAC for mobile phones?

1. At present, most mobile phones on the market can support the FiiO music App, but the USB audio standard of various phone brands is not uniform, so we cannot guarantee full compatibility. 2. The BTR5 2021 supports a switch to "USB Audio Adapter Mode" by just one press. When a USB connection is detected the BTR5 2021, it will automatically prompt you to turn on "USB Audio Adapter" mode. At this time, just press any button so that it will turn off the charging function and enter the "USB Audio Adapter Mode".

How to use the car mode?

After turning on the car mode, you can connect the BTR5 2021 to the on-board USB port, and the BTR5 2021 will power on automatically when the vehicle engine starts, and power off when the engine stops.

How to clear the pairing record on BTR5 2021?

Hold the Volume'+' and Volume'-' buttons at the same time for about 5s when the BTR5 2021 is powered on.

How to pair the BTR5 2021 with a smartphone via NFC? Why is the NFC function not so sensitive sometimes?

Ensure the mobile phone supports NFC. Turn on the BTR5 2021 and unlock the phone. Put the NFC area of the BTR5 2021 close to that of the phone (usually there will be a dialogue popping up or a prompt tone). NFC is a near field communication technology. The NFC sensing area of the mobile phone and the BTR5 2021 must be closer enough to each other to be paired. In addition, the NFC power of different mobile phones is different (mobile phones with a metal shell have relatively low NFC sensitivity). In addition, a mobile phone wearing a phone case also has low NFC sensitivity, so it is suggested to remove the case and try again.

Is there a delay for its Bluetooth? How long will it be?

Currently, any Bluetooth device will have a delay. But there is no obvious influence when listening to music. The time of delay is different for different Bluetooth codecs. The BTR5 2021 supports aptX LL (less than 40ms delay). For other Bluetooth codecs, the delay is about 100ms.

Does the BTR5 2021 support standby mode? 

Yes. When it's connected successfully yet without playback and operation, it will enter standby mode (low power consumption). When it's not connected, it will turn off automatically after 2 minutes if there is no operation. (the auto-timer can be set on the App). The battery life is about 300 hours under standby mode.

What's the material for the BTR5 2021?

The BTR5 2021's middle frame is made of aluminum alloy, with a 6H hardness 2.5D tempered glass on both the front and back panel (scratch resistance is the same as that of iPhone's), which is not easy to scratch in use. But please don't put it together with sharp metal objects like keys. Besides, the back clip is made of ABS (Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene).

What are the accessories for the BTR5 2021?

-BTR5 2021 Standard Edition: Type-C to Type-C short cable, back clip, user manual, warranty card, Bluetooth instructions. -BTR5 2021 Apple Edition: except for those included in the standard edition, there is an extra Type-C to Lightning cable.

What to do if the BTR5 2021 is frozen?

If the BTR5 2021 is frozen, please try to hold the Power button for at least 10 seconds to reset it.

Does the BTR5 2021 support LHDC/HWA? 

No. Ever since the HWA was launched, its sound quality has been recognized by many users in China. The FiiO BTR3, as the earliest product on the market that perfectly supports HWA, was very popular. However, it has encountered some problems that we could not solve temporarily. For example: 1. HWA, as the latest technology, has more poor connection reliability than LDAC and aptX. 2. There were few devices that support HWA, especially consumers in foreign countries. Most of them have no idea about the HWA. 3. The internal ROM capacity of the CSR8675 is limited, especially after an upgrade to Bluetooth 5.0. The BLE function (App control) will take up more space. While coupled with the HWA algorithm, it will have more limited ROM capacity, and will restrict us to make improvements and expansion for the product functions. This is the main reason. 4. As the owner of HWA, Huawei also stated that HWA will face a large upgrade, and the upgraded HWA will no longer be compatible with the previous version. So Huawei themselves also canceled HWA support on their latest system.

How about the Bluetooth distance and signal strength? 

Please refer to the Bluetooth instruction card inside the package. The BTR5 2021 supports high-rate and high-quality signal transmission, but the transmission distance will be shorter when transmitting high-quality signals. We have also compared similar devices of other brands. It turned out that the BTR5 2021 was excellent.

Does the BTR5 2021 support the headphones' remote control and a microphone?

The BTR5 2021 supports headphones of CTIA standard for remote control and microphone. But OMTP headphones can only listen to music.

Don't sweat it, this FiiO BTR5 2021 comes with a 1 year warranty from FiiO that covers manufacturing defects. All products featured on Headphone Zone are backed by an original manufacturer's warranty. Read more about FiiO's warranty in India.

DESCRIPTION


HIGH-PERFORMANCE USB DAC AND AMP DESIGNED FOR PHONES AND PC’S


xDuoo Link V2 is the latest USB DAC and headphone amplifier designed for use with phones with low power consumption and high performance. A professional power amplifier is built-in and Link V2 can dynamically self-adapt the output to the impedance of the connected earphones. It will intelligently adjust the output power according to the impedance of the connected earphone to avoid over-driving and loud sound. In this way, your earphones and ears are well taken care of and protected. Link V2 uses a USB adapter and is connected with a computer using the USB port and offers plug and play compatibility with macOS, Windows 7/8/10/11 and Linux operating system.









EQUIPPED WITH CIRRUS LOGIC DECODING CHIP TO DELIVER HI-RES AUDIO


xDuoo Link V2 features a Cirrus Logic CS43131 decoding chip that can support PCM decoding up to 32bit/384kHZ and DSD256 while ordinary mobile can only decode up to 16bit/48kHz audio. Moreover, with this high-performance chip Link V2 can present more details, actual tonal quality and high definition audio. Link V2 conforms to Hi-Res Audio standards while supporting up to 32bit/384 kHz and DSD256 audio input. The SNR reaches 125dB, which improves the sound quality of mobile output.








NO BATTERY DESIGN WITH HANDY INLINE CONTROLS FOR CONVENIENCE


xDuoo Link V2 adopts a no-battery design to avoid any issue with the connected devices. Link V2, when connected to your cellphone will only consume a small amount of power as it features a low power consumption architecture. It works on a low current, so you won't have to worry about draining your phone's battery. xDuoo Link V2 has been designed considering many aspects of usage and features inline controls to reach for the most commonly used functions. You will find a Play/Pause key on the Link V2 along with Volume keys to quickly adjust the volume without having to reach for your phone.








LIGHTWEIGHT AND COMPACT DESIGN. COMES IN 3 DISTINCT COLOURS


xDuoo Link V2 processes and designs aluminium alloy shells by using CNC machining with a fashionable and compact appearance. Utilising the CNC process the Link V2 weighs only 15g, and its size is the same as a USB thumb drive. It is very convenient to carry and use and is the ideal choice for office and commuting and is the gospel of mobile music enthusiasts. Along with its compact and lightweight design, the xDuoo Link V2 comes in three colours to choose from - Red, Grey and Blue.

portableAmp.product_description:
Designed in  Korea





1 Year ofWarranty





Ideal forAudiophiles





Best Suited forPortable Use





Ideal forCommuting





Cirrus Logic CS43198Dual DAC Chip





Pair with Laptop via USB-C to USB-A adapter





2 VrmsPower Output





MetalBuild



 

Super LightweightDesign



DESCRIPTION


POWERHOUSE USB-C DOUBLE DAC FOR HIGH DEFINITION SONIC EXCELLENCE


Designed to complement Astell&Kern's series of Digital Audio Players, the PEE51 lets you enjoy the dynamic and lifelike high-definition sound on your computer and Android mobile phones without using a high-end sound card. The PEE51 features two Cirrus Logic CS43198 MasterHIFI DACs that support Hi-Res audio playback including native DSD256 and 32bit / 384kHz.





INDIGENOUSLY DEVELOPED AUDIO CIRCUIT FOR STABLE AND UNRIVALLED PERFORMANCE


Putting years of experience to best use, Astell&Kern has designed a highly intricate circuit on a small and 6-layered 14 x 41 mm printed circuit board (PCB). Even the micro resistors and tantalum capacitors used in the PEE51 were indigenously developed by Astell&Kern. These are the same capacitors that are used in the A&K DAPs and they optimise audio circuits to minimize fluctuations leading to overall stability and unrivalled sound quality.





AN INDEPENDENT ANALOG AMPLIFIER TO ELIMINATE UNNECESSARY COLOURZATION & DISTORTION


The power of CS43198 DACs is combined with an independent analogue amplifier to deliver highly authentic sound reproduction. This allows you to enjoy a dynamic and clear sound that is free of colourisation and distortion just the way artists intend their music to sound. The PEE51 is compact and drives even high impedance headphones easily with an output level of 2 Vrms.









ENJOY ASTELL&KERN SOUND SIGNATURE ON YOUR ANDROID SMARTPHONES AND COMPUTERS


Offering the widely used USB-C connector, the Astell&Kern PEE51 is compatible with almost all the latest Android smartphones, tablets, Windows 10 computers and macOS. You can connect headphones to the PEE51 with a 3.5 mm connector. The PEE51 lets you discover the popular Astell&Kern sound signature using your audio devices. From full-size headsets to in-ears, you connect a host of headphones that support 3.5mm 3-pole and 4-pole plugs. Kindly note that 4-pole earbuds with inline controller and microphone functions are not supported.





ROBUST 4-CORE SILVER-PLATED COPPER CABLE FOR NOISE-FREE SOUND REPRODUCTION


Empowered with a custom 4-core cable for precise sound reproduction, the PEE51 improves disconnect resistance. With reinforced aramid fibre, the PEE51 can resist a tensile force of up to 200 Newton. This thick cable consists of spiralled silver-plated copper wires wrapped around a centre Technora Aramid core to eliminate external noise. This copper wire also helps to deliver clean and rich surround sound. There is unique shielding on these cables that eliminates distortion and noise in digital and analogue signals coming from the playback device.





"LIGHT AND SHADOW" THEMED ELEGANT DESIGN THAT BALANCES BEAUTY AND COMFORT


Featuring the "light and shadow" design, the USB-C DUAL DAC utilises a unique design that has been fundamental to Astell&Kern products. This design consists of a single centerline that crosses from right to left. The ratio of the angles is optimised to ensure that the sharp portions of the four top faces coincide at a single point. Reflection on each side of the design follows the movement of light. The surface is polished to make one-hand use more comfortable. Reflecting on the durability of other Astell&Kern machines, the PEE51 uses robust metal elements.





KINDLY READ THROUGH THE FOLLOWING PRECAUTIONARY MEASURES FOR BEST USER EXPERIENCE


Considering limitations of hardware, software and the overall system some of the devices might not be able to function perfectly with the Astell&Kern PEE51. iOS devices like iPhones and iPads are not compatible with the PEE51 currently while some Android devices may need changes in settings to work efficiently. If you are using the PEE51 with a computer, the computer will automatically install the required driver. However, a separate installation may be required for high-end audio playback. This extra installation file can be accessed from the Support-Download section of the Astell&Kern global website. Kindly note that to play hi-res audio files like DSD and PCM on your smartphones you will need a separate free / paid application that is compatible with high-definition audio playback. It is advised to get the volume level checked before connecting headphones to the PEE51 as there are chances of some devices having maximum volume by default. When you are using the PEE51 with an Astell&Kern player as an external D / A converter the volume will be set to the highest, by default. Listening to music on high volumes can damage your listening. Astell&Kern does not recommend using the PEE51 with Astell&Kern players. Firmware updates may be available from time to time to enhance stability and performance. Visit the Support-Download section of the Astell&Kern global site to get more information on updates and to check if any update is available.

RAGHAV SOMANI
Headphone Guru 

About Raghav Somani
Raghav Somani is the Founder & CEO of Headphone Zone. An avid audiophile and musician since 2008, his choice of headphones include STAX Electrostats, Audeze LCD 3, and for music on the go, the JH Audio Roxanne + Astell&Kern SP1000 is never too far away. On his playlist, you'll find A.R. Rahman, Michael Jackson, and the Eagles.






DESCRIPTION


ELEVATE TO HIGH-RES MUSIC LISTENING WITH THE SLEEK & COMPACT UA2


An advanced USB DAC/AMP from Shanling's UA line, the UA2 features a powerful ESS ES9038Q2M DAC along with an Ricore RT6863 amplifier to deliver a high-grade sonic experience. Sporting a compact and portable design, the UA2 is a powerhouse DAC/AMP designed to help you enjoy Hi-Res Audio of up to PCM 32Bit/786kHz and DSD512, on the go.









WITH STANDARD USB-C CONNECTOR, INTERCHANGEABLE CABLE & NINTENDO SWITCH COMPATIBILITY


Connectivity is easy with a USB-C connector which allows you to connect UA2 to almost every modern-day smartphone for high-grade sound. The cables are interchangeable for flexibility and upgradability. The portable UA2 is compatible with Android, Personal Computers, and iOS (lightning cable sold separately). There is a dedicated mode in the UA2 for Nintendo Switch compatibility.












IDEAL FOR A VARIETY OF HEADPHONES AND OFFERS 3.5MM & 2.5MM CONNECTIVITY OPTIONS


With a power output of up to 95mW at 32 ohms, the Shanling UA2 can drive regular headphones with absolute ease. Additionally, you get two output connections with the UA2 - a standard single-ended 3.5 mm output for regular headphones and a 2.5 mm balanced output for balanced sound output.









WITH A NOISE ELIMINATING LOW-DROPOUT REGULATOR & A LED INDICATOR


With a low-dropout regulator, the UA2 is able to keep the levels of background noise in check ensuring that the sound stays clear and free of noise and hiss. This makes the UA2 a perfect match for sensitive earphones. Keep an eye on the current sampling rate through the LED indicator. This lets you know if you are playing the high-quality DSD format. It also allows you to check if you are connected to your gaming console.









TAILOR THE SOUND TO YOUR PREFERENCE WITH THE DEDICATED COMPANION APP


Open a whole new world of settings with the Companion App which allows you to personalize your sound. Get better control over the Shanling UA2 with this App. It lets you tweak different gain modes and digital filters to ensure the sound is fine-tuned to match your music taste.

 For an Audiophile looking to listen to music on the go with the convenience of their mobile phones, this is an absolutely priceless DAC. For me, the 2.5mm balanced output is what makes this a serious audiophile essential you can't go wrong with.






RAGHAV SOMANI
Headphone Guru 

About Raghav Somani
Raghav Somani is the Founder & CEO of Headphone Zone. An avid audiophile and musician since 2008, his choice of headphones include STAX Electrostats, Audeze LCD 3, and for music on the go, the JH Audio Roxanne + Astell&Kern SP1000 is never too far away. On his playlist, you'll find A.R. Rahman, Michael Jackson, and the Eagles.





DESCRIPTION


A PORTABLE 24 BIT DAC/AMP THAT OFFERS 2 AUDIO OUTPUTS


The XB10 features a dedicated DAC that has been tuned using Astell&Kern's latest technologies and offers high-quality sound up to 24-bit/192 kHz. The amplifier drives just about any headphone while amplifying even the minutest of details. A standard-sized 3.5mm jack provides connectivity to maximum devices. The 2.5mm jack, on the other hand, is for those audio enthusiasts who are looking to enjoy a deeper level of sound. It eliminates ground noise and provides a balanced connection resulting in increased output.





STREAM HIGH-QUALITY AUDIO WITH BLUETOOTH CONNECTIVITY


The Astell&Kern XB10 is very flexible in terms of connectivity. It supports SBC, aptX™ and aptX™ HD codecs for Android devices and the AAC codec for iOS. Just turn on your smartphone, tablet or laptop's Bluetooth and you're good to go. Qualcomm aptX™ HD technology is capable of transmitting up to 24-bit/48 kHz audio that is faithful to the original audio file.










EMBEDDED WITH A MICROPHONE AND IN LINE CONTROLS


The XB10 is a game-changer providing solutions to all your problems. Along with high-quality music, it also lets you answer calls without having to access your phone. Answering/Declining calls just requires the tap of a button while the inbuilt mic makes for crystal-clear calls.










EASY TO CARRY LIGHTWEIGHT AND PORTABLE DESIGN


The XB10's design mimics the appearance of the scattering of light from a star. The surface is split into quadrants for easier operability. It is extremely lightweight and portable. Want to carry your music along? Simply clip the device to your shirt or bag and run along. The clip keeps your hands free and lets you flaunt Astell&Kern's classy light and shadow design.

FAQs

Whats the warranty period? How to claim warranty?

The warranty period on all Astell&Kern products is 1 year. Read more information on Astelle&Kern warranty.

What is the battery life of the Astell&Kern AK XB10? 

The battery life lasts a good 5 hours of continuous music playback with a recharge time of 2 hours.

Could It be used with iOS devices as well?

Yes, the Astell&Kern AK XB10 is compatible with iOS devices using AAC codec as well with Android devices using aptX™ HD codecs.

What is AptX?

In Bluetooth some of the data is inaudible and it simply doesn't sound as good as audio transmitted over other wireless methods or a wired connection. But, in AptX there is a lossless transmission as it provides CD-like quality. AptX is good. Be like AptX!

What do you mean by aptX and AAC? Do they really make my music sound different?

AAC and aptX are Bluetooth codecs that improve the quality of audio that is being transferred wirelessly. To know more, check out this article on Bluetooth codecs.

Does this Bluetooth Amplifier come with any balanced outputs?

Yes, the Astell&Kern AK XB10 does come with a 2.5mm balanced output.

Can it be used with my headphones?

Yes, you connect your earphones and headphones through the 2.5mm and 3.5mm audio jack slots provided by Astell&Kern.

What Bluetooth version does Astell&Kern AK XB10 support?

The Astell&Kern AK XB10 comes with the Bluetooth version 4.1.

What is so great about the AK XB10?

Apart from it working as an amplifier it eliminates ground noise around you which in turn provides a better listening experience.

HiRelPlayer.title: Cayin - N3Pro
HiRelPlayer.product_description:
Chi-Fi Excellence





1 Year ofWarranty





Ideal forAudiophiles





Ideal for CasualMusic Listening





Best Suited forPortable Use





MetalBuild



  

Bluetooth withLDAC & AAC





11 Hours ofBattery Life





Battery Capacity of4100 mAh





4.4mmBalanced Output





AKM AK4493Dual DAC Chip





VolumeControls



DESCRIPTION


BALANCED, DUAL TIMBRE PORTABLE AUDIO PLAYER


With dual timbre and single-ended output, the Cayin N3Pro has a solid-state Stella dynamic and separation. If you are a fan of vocals and pop music the vacuum tube will help you get the best sound. The N3Pro features Dual Operation Mode - Triode and Ultra Linear. With these options, you get to change the sound signature and output power which helps you to optimise the sound for a better music listening experience.





THE DUAL OPERATION MODE: TRIODE MODE & ULTRA-LINEAR MODE


Personalise the sound the way you want to with the Dual Operation Mode. Under the Triode Mode, enjoy elegant and rich soundstage with focused imaging, emphasised mid-range frequencies and it is ideal for string and vocal-centric music. On the other hand, the Ultra-Linear Mode makes your music sound more lively, clear and impactful. You get to enjoy a better sense of depth, space and soundstage. This mode is ideal for instrumentals and for songs that need more punch, dynamics and control.










WITH VINTAGE MILITARY MINIATURE TUBE


The Dual Operation Mode: Triode Mode & Ultra-Linear Mode requires a low power consumption and a warm pentode tube. Therefore Cayin N3Pro is integrated with Dual Raytheon JAN6418. This was originally used with military communication applications and was a part of premium Condenser microphones owing to its warm classic tube sound.





HIGH SUSPENSION EFFECT AND SHOCK TREATMENT


The vibrating filament is disturbing and to address this the tubes are installed inside a custom made silicone case. The suspension effect is highly improved with the integration of flexible PCB. You can listen to music on Cayin N3Pro even when it is inside the backpack with low detrimental effects. This is the result of months of trails and redesigns.





FEATURING DUAL DAC AND CUSTOM MADE LITHIUM BATTERY


The Cayin N3Pro comes with dual AKM AK4493EQ DAC chipsets which can decode up to DSD256 and 32 Bit/384kHz along with excellent dynamic range and resolution. You can enjoy improved dynamic range, signal to noise ratio and channel separation with mono mode. Enjoy extended hours of battery life with a custom made Lithium battery and power management system. Enjoy 11 hours of playback with 3.5mm phone (solid state), 9 hours of music time with 3.5m phone (Vaccum tube) and 9 hours of playtime with 4.4mm phone.









FULLY BALANCED DESIGN WITH 800MW HEADPHONE OUTPUT


The N3Pro delivers hot and cold signal streams similarly but not the polarity. They have to go through LPF and headphone amplifiers in parallel. While L+, L-, R+ and R- are delivered separately, common-mode noise will be reduced to nothing and cross talk will be decreased. Notably, the difference in the headphone amp output and hot and cold signals will have a huge impact on the output power and channel separation.









EXPERIENCE HI-RES WIRELESS SOUND AND STREAMING SERVICES


You can easily connect the Cayin M3Pro to Bluetooth headphones and speakers and enjoy Hi-Res Wireless music with duplex Bluetooth 5.0. Enjoy music streaming services like Tidal, Qobuz on your mobile phone. Listen to your songs on N3Pro with UAT, LDAC and AAC. You can multi-connectivity options including the 4.4mm BAL, 3.5mm SE Phone Out, 3.5mm SE Line Out (Dedicated), Two ways USB audio (DAC and Transport) S/PDIF Out (Embedded) 4.4mm BAL line Out (shared).













CONNECT CAYIN N3PRO WITH MOBILE DEVICES WITH HIBYLINK


Manage volume, music library, playback and create playlists with HiByMusic App. You can use this app to connect Cayi N3Pro to your mobile devices. You can use WiFi to get OTA software updates for your Cayin N3Pro. You can even transfer files wirelessly using Cayin N3pro. It supports a TF card of up to 1TB and you can connect it to a USB storage using a Type C connector. The multicolour smart glowing LED on the N3Pro denotes sample rate while playback.












CUSTOM DESIGNED INTERFACE AND INITIATIVE CONTROLS


Cayin N3Pro comes with 3.2 inches IPS touch screen along with 480 x 360 LG panel, great viewing angle, high contrast text and image display. Controlling the player is all easy with knobs, buttons and the touch screen interface. This player can playback all popular music file formats including the SACD-ISO. N3Pro is your all-day music companion which weighs around 195g making it lightweight and easy to be carried around.

HiRelPlayer.title: Astell&Kern - A&norma SR25 MKII
HiRelPlayer.product_description:
Designed in  Korea





1 Year ofWarranty





Ideal forAudiophiles





Best Suited forPortable Use



  

Bluetooth with LDAC & aptX HD





20 Hours ofBattery Life





2.5mm & 4.4mm Balanced Output





Upto 4.0VrmsPower Output





Cirrus Logic CS43198Dual DAC Chip





VolumeControls





Upto 1 TB of Storage





Battery Capacity of3150 mAh



DESCRIPTION


MEET THE ALL-NEW, TECHNOLOGICALLY UPGRADED A&NORMA SR25 MKII


The team at Astell&Kern are always pushing the boundaries in terms of technological innovations, delivering refined products to the audiophile community. The same is reflected in the A&norma SR25 MKII, which has undergone a complete upgrade in design and audio architecture to deliver life-like audio. The SR25 MKII features an updated Quad-core CPU along with the Cirrus Logic CS43198 Dual-DAC chip. It also extends native playback support for DSD256 and adds compatibility for MQA and LDAC protocols.





UPGRADED AUDIO ARCHITECTURE OFFERS ULTRA HIGH-RESOLUTION SOUND


The all-new Astell&Kern A&norma SR25 MKII delivers improved performance across the board compared to the SR25, including bass response, dynamic range, soundstage and imaging. The SR25 MKII utilises Astell&Kern's latest audio design technology for Bit-to-Bit playback with resolution up to 32bit/384 kHz. Native DSD audio is available up to 11.2 MHz, along with LDAC in addition to Qualcomm® aptX™ HD support resulting in true audiophile sound quality.









FULL 8X MQA DECODING FUSED WITH BALANCED OUTPUT FOR CLEAN AUDIO


The Astell&Kern SR25 MKII comes with Master Quality Authenticated (MQA) support. MQA authentication is a badge of approval, guaranteeing players master-quality audio output. The device can perform 8x decoding of MQA files to deliver outstanding sound quality. To further enhance the signal path, the SR25 MKII now comes with 2.5mm, 3.5mm and 4.4mm output options allowing you to connect to various devices. These connectivity options allow you to enjoy your music without worrying about adaptors.






ENJOY MUSIC WIRELESSLY WITH BT SINK AND SHARE FILES VIA AK FILE DROP


The Astell&Kern A&norma SR25 MKII comes with the newly introduced BT Sink function. This feature allows you to connect the SR25 MKII to an external device via Bluetooth, similar to connecting a smartphone with a BT speaker. Music from an external device, such as a smartphone can now be played back in high-quality on the SR25 MKII using the BT Sink function. SR25 MKII also comes with the new AK File Drop function, making file transfers easier and more convenient. Using AK File Drop, you can freely transfer files wirelessly through a PC, smartphone, or FTP program located on the same network. Music file management is now possible with a wireless solution.












OFFERING 20+ HOURS OF BATTERY LIFE WITH REPLAY GAIN FUNCTION


The Astell&Kern SR25 MKII can offer a playback time of up to 20 hours with one full charge, thanks to its optimised, energy-efficient circuitry. Enjoy your music anytime, anywhere with the SR25 MKII’s extended playback time and its portability. No need to worry about battery life. The SR25 MKII also comes embedded with ReplayGain, which adjusts the volume level of different sources to a uniform level. This feature is thoughtful and allows to maintain stable volume levels regardless of the device connected.





COMPLETELY REDESIGNED CHASSIS TO DELIVER ARTEFACT FREE AUDIO


Astell&Kern A&norma SR25 MKII comes with a redesigned chassis. The top and bottom edges of the bezel are angled, giving the impression of a smaller rectangle floating freely inside the chassis. The pattern on the side is designed to draw attention to the volume wheel. This redesigned chassis is made of aluminium and features noise and electromagnetic shield cans to reduce interference with the audio signal. This design is further enhanced by applying a highly conductive, hyper-pure silver plating on the shield cans for superior shielding that provides excellent audio performance.

FAQS

What is the warranty? How do I claim it?

All Astell&Kern products come with a year warranty. You can simply get in touch with us to claim the warranty.Click here.

Does the Astell&Kern A&norma SR25 MKII support MQA?

Yes, the Astell&Kern A&norma SR25 MKII does support MQA. Download master quality files and make most of them.

Can the Astell&Kern A&norma SR25 MKII be used as an external DAC?

Yes, Astell&Kern A&norma SR25 MKII can be used as an external DAC or Bluetooth receiver with smartphones and tablets.

Does the Astell&Kern A&norma SR25 MKII come with any Balanced Output?

The Astell&Kern A&norma SR25 MKII does come with a 2.5mm and 4.4mm balanced output to enhance the sound quality further.

What is the battery life of Astell&Kern A&norma SR25 MKII player?

Astell&Kern A&norma SR25 MKII comes with 20 hours of battery life on continuous play.

How many DAC chips are present in Astell&Kern A&norma SR25 MKII player?

The Astell&Kern A&norma SR25 MKII is a dual DAC player and hence it comes with two Cirrus Logic DAC Chips.

What is the Bluetooth version on the Astell&Kern A&norma SR25 MKII?

The Astell&Kern A&norma SR25 MKII comes with Bluetooth version 4.2

Does the Astell&Kern A&norma SR25 MKII support aptX?

Yes, the Astell&Kern A&norma SR25 MKII support Bluetooth codecs like LDAC, aptX HD.

What is the storage limit on the Astell&Kern A&norma SR25 MKII? 

The Astell&Kern A&norma SR25 MKII offers an expandable memory of 1TB.

What is Open APP Service?

The Open APP Service enables the user to install specific APK music streaming apps to the device.

How to install third-party applications on Astell&Kern players?

Copy the desired APK into the Open Service folder of the product and install the relevant App in the Menu-Service of the product.

What models support Open App Service?

Astell&Kern SR15, SR25, KANN ALPHA, SA700, KANN Cube, SE100, SE180, SE200, SP1000M, SP1000, SP2000 support Open App Service.

What applications does the Open App Service support?

7digital Music, Amazon Music, Apple Music, Audible, Awa, Bandcamp, BBC iPlayer Radio Bugs, Dsaudio, FLO, foobar2000, Genie, IDAGIO, Joox, Kickbox, LastFM, Melon, Moov, My Yuner Radio, nugs.net, Onkyo HF Player, Pandora, Player FM, Qobuz, QQmusic, Sirius, Soundcloud, Spotify, Tidal, TuneIn, Xiaomi music, Yandex Music.

Can you download Tidal songs and playlists and play them in an offline mode?

You can add apps like tidal using the Open APP Service. See here. Some apps such as Spotify and Tidal support offline mode. For full instructions, please see the instructions of the corresponding application. Also, some apps allow for you to choose the location of where the files are stored. To save storage space on the device, you may choose files to be saved to the the external memory (microSD card) tin the settings of the app. Note: You will not be able to access these files outside of the application, they will be hidden.

How to play Tidal in offline mode?

1. While connected to WiFi, download content that you would like to access while in offline mode. 2. Once all files are downloaded as accessible for offline mode, turn off WiFi on the player. 3. Access your offline content in the Tidal app and press play. Note: You will still be able to directly access your currently playing content through the Notification Bar while the app is running. - Caution - The source of apps listed is unknown and not provided by Astell&Kern. Please be aware that if any app is installed, the device may be damaged and personal data compromised. If you install an app from an unknown source, despite the warning, Astell&Kern is not responsible for any damages to the device and data resulting from the app's installation, and downloading and installing such apps may limit the scope of after-sales services provided by Astell&Kern. Installation of any app is under the discretion of the user.


Warranty & Media Reviews






1 Year Warranty
Don't sweat it, this Astell&Kern A&norma SR25 MKII comes with a 1 year warranty from Astell&Kern that covers manufacturing defects. All products featured on Headphone Zone are backed by an original manufacturer's warranty. Read more about Astell&Kern's warranty in India.

HiRelPlayer.title: Lotoo - PAW Pico
HiRelPlayer.product_description:
Chi-Fi Excellence


1 Year ofWarranty


Ideal forAudiophiles


 Ideal forSports & Gym


Best Suited forPortable Use


10 Hours ofBattery Life


Ti3105DAC Chip


Pair with Laptop via USB


32GBInternal Memory


Battery Capacity of300 mAh


  Super LightweightDesign


VolumeControls




















DESCRIPTION


ADI BLACKFIN DSP PROCESSOR SUPPORTING VARIOUS AUDIO FORMATS


Lotoo PAW Pico features a high fidelity processor for decoding multiple audio formats with the highest quality and transparency possible. High fidelity decoding is achieved by the ADI Blackfin 706 DSP processor embedded in the S9 Pro. This DSP processor is utilised as the core to efficiently process a variety of specialised digital audio algorithms, delivering superior performance. The PAW Pico is capable of supporting DSD 64, DSD128, PCM 32bits/192 kHz, DFF, DSF, ISO, FLAC, APE, WAV, MP3, WMA, OGG, M4A, AAC, AIF, ALAC, CUE and AIFF audio formats.









TEXAS INSTRUMENTS CHIP ALLOWING THE DEVICE TO FUNCTION AS A DAC


Lotoo PAW Pico comes packed with the latest technologies in the audio world. Apart from offering flawless playback of various high-quality audio files, PAW Pico is also capable of acting as a standalone DAC (Digital Audio Converter) when connected to a computer or laptop. To enable this the team at Lotto have equipped the PAW Pico with a Texas Instruments professional DAC decoder chip. Lotoo used a Ti3105 chip, the same as featured on higher-end audio players from the company. This chip preserves the battery life of PAW Pico and offers voltage output enough to drive various headphones.





PACKED WITH GPS, MOTION SENSORS, BLUETOOTH AND SPORTS MODE


The list of the features on the Lotoo PAW Pico is incredible and showcases many innovative technologies never seen on an audio player. The PAW Pico comes embedded with Swiss u-blox GPS, Motion sensors and Bluetooth low energy (BLE) support. The PAW Pico also comes with an intelligent sports mode that monitors the duration of the activity, distance travelled and registers speed and other data with real-time monitoring of your movement. This is progressive and allows you to track your activities while listening to your favourite music.








COMPACT DESIGN AND COMPATIBILITY WITH VARIOUS DEVICES


Lotoo PAW Pico is designed to be portable and easy to operate. The device is only 40 mm in width and 46 mm in height, roughly about the size of a small box. PAW Pico outshines the rest due to its minimalistic design, high performance and durability. Lotoo PAW Pico is compatible with Windows, Android, macOS and iOS. The USB connection lets you pair the PAW Pico by simply plugging it into your device. Lotoo PAW Pico stands out for its universal compatibility, plug and play nature and ultra-compact design.












DURABLE BUILD FUSED WITH 32 GB MEMORY AND 10+ HOURS OF PLAYBACK


Lotoo PAW Pico is built with precision and features a chassis made with quality materials. This chassis makes the device sturdy from the exterior and the Japanese APS volume wheel makes volume control easier. This volume wheel is tested and allows for up to 100,000 rotations without any failure. Lotoo PAW Pico comes with 32Gb of built-in Toshiba storage allowing you to store up to 2000 lossless quality tracks on the device. To support the playback capability, the PAW Pico offers up to 10 hours of playback time on a single charge. This is much needed and allows you to enjoy music without interruptions.












BUNDLED WITH OCCLUSAL CLIP, SPORTS ARMBAND AND LOTOO PICO APP


The Lotoo PAW Pico comes bundled with a detachable serrated occlusal clip along with a professional sports armband. This clip and armband are made of high-quality materials and are sturdy enough to attach the device and wear it during physical activities and experience a hands-free experience. There is also a Lotoo Pico App available to download for android users and with this app, you can enable automatic data synchronisation and monitor them via the app.

HiRelPlayer.title: Cayin - iDAP-6
HiRelPlayer.product_description:
The Short Story




Designed inChina





1 Year ofWarranty





Ideal forAudiophiles





Ideal forIndoor Use





MetalBuild



  

Bluetooth withaptX



DESCRIPTION



Convenience in an Audio Player

With the iDAP6 you can get easy and quick access to portable devices like SD card and USB thumb drive OTG with 1A current. It can handle 2.5" HDD directly.






Connect Anywhere, Any time
You can get LAN connection through WiFi or with the Ethernet cable enable network-based applications. Samba the file/music sharing with NAS or PCs in LAN. Pushed content from DLNA library (DLNA Render) Pushed music from Apple devices (Airplay)





 



Extraordinary Music Player

The iDAP6 has three USB Audio output or USB storage. Along with the regular RCA (coaxial) and Toslink (optical) comes the professionally used applications BNC (coaxial)

 

 

Comprehensive and Technically advanced

The iDAP6 comes with AES/EBU which is recommended by studio professionals and is the most reliable digital interface. The best alternative lower jitter, delivered through HDIM as high quality cables-I2S which is the native digital audio for signal transmission.

 






Access
You can connect your iDAP-6 with your phone via Bluetooth as it supports HiByLink. You can even control playback of iDAP-6 remotely through a touch screen graphical interface. You can also share files, mobile app will read the file headers and facilitate features which is originally not available like searching, playlists, file management etc. It is compatible with off-the-shelf Bluetooth remote control.


 



All-New UI Design
The iDAP-6 is designed with the All-New UI design for the music playback. It is intuitive, visible, comprehensive and self-explained. It has multi-layered to best-fit the 3.95" AMOLED screen. All information are well organized and are properly presented.





 






Multi-Function Knob
With the knob on the iDAP-6 you can easily control all features. Rotate left and right to browse and press enter to select your choice.


 

 

Dual Bluetooth 4.1

The iDAP-6 can be used as wireless digital transport or playback to Bluetooth headphones. You just have to accept audio signal form the paired device and it can function as a wireless interface to a sound system.

 

 

The i-Series Family

The i-Series has almost the same look and feel with matching material and finishing. The iDAC-6, iHA-6 and iDAP-6 can be used as complete Desktop Trio system or you can mix and match them with different audio equipments.

 


 




Hardware Highlights
Two extremely low-noise high-precision Femtosecond Crystal Oscilallators with RMS jitter below 0.1ps@10hz-1MHz and phase noise below -166dBc/Hz@1MHz offset. High precision low jitter digital transmission is the base of high quality digital playback. It is how we deliver a natural, non-digital and musical sound to your audio system. They designed and manufactured the toroidal transformers in-house. It is securely shielded and will provide low-noise, high efficient power for iDAP-6 circuit. They use NICHICON electrolytic capacitors from Japan in their power supply circuit. This improves the transparency of the system, and display the detail and layering effortlessly.




 



 

See More

HiRelPlayer.title: FiiO - M11 Plus ESS
HiRelPlayer.product_description:
Chi-Fi Excellence





1 Year ofWarranty





Ideal forAudiophiles





Best Suited forPortable Use



  

Bluetooth withLDAC, aptX HD & AAC





14 Hours ofBattery Life





2.5mm & 4.4mmBalanced Output





ESS Sabre ES9068ASDual DAC Chip





Upto 660mW @ 32ΩPower Output





Upto 2TBof Storage





Battery Capacity of6000 mAh





VolumeControls



DESCRIPTION


FIIO INTRODUCES THE ALL-NEW UPGRADED M11 PLUS ESS ANDROID DIGITAL AUDIO PLAYER


The wait for the all-new M11 Plus ESS is over. FiiO presents the upgraded FiiO M11 Plus ESS with ESS Sabre DAC chipset. The latest M11 Plus ESS is equipped with two high-performance ES9068AS decoding chips that deliver outstanding performance improvement over its predecessor. FiiO has brought several updates with the M11 Plus ESS variant, including a low-pass filter and dual THX AAA72 amp chips to match the ESS Sabre DAC chipset. The chipset is tuned to achieve high SNR ratings ensuring quality sound performance with cleaner background response. M11 Plus ESS has improved output power ratings, providing up to 588mW of clean output at 32Ω of load. FiiO M11 Plus ESS now has MQA rendering capabilities, providing you with full MQA support even in USB DAC mode. The battery life of the new M11 Plus ESS is also improved to give 11.5 hours of playtime so you can enjoy your music without interruptions.





UPGRADED WITH ESS SABRE DAC CHIPSET AND THX AMP MODULES FOR PRISTINE AUDIO


FiiO has upgraded the DAC chipset of the M11 Plus ESS digital audio player with two high-performance ES9068AS audio decoding chips. This new chipset is tuned and adjusted for achieving improved performance, even better than the AKM counterpart with better Signal to Noise Ratio and Distortion ratings. The careful tuning minimises distortion to 0.0001% for a highly accurate audio representation. M11 Plus ESS can natively decode DSD512 and PCM 768kHz files effortlessly. To support the DAC chipset FiiO has featured dual THX AAA-78 headphone amplifier modules for the M11 Plus ESS. These amp modules have a feed-forward error correction technology that lets you experience sound with detail with better output power and present a soundstage as the artists intended.






EXPERIENCE BLAZING-FAST COMPUTING WITH SNAPDRAGON 660 PROCESSOR + ANDROID 10


FiiO utilises the legendary and high performing Qualcomm Octa-Core Snapdragon 660 processor, coupled with high-speed 4GB RAM and 64GB internal storage, enabling high demand multithreaded computations (audio or otherwise) to be performed in record time. The Snapdragon 660 processor features an architecture capable of providing a smartphone-like smooth experience, enabling you to watch videos and play games. This processor also ensures ultra-low power consumption and features an Adreno 512 GPU with a 14NM process to enhance the performance even further. With the FiiO M11 Plus ESS, you get to experience a super smooth user interface. All thanks to the almighty Qualcomm Octa-Core Snapdragon 660 processor. To add to this you get Android 10 OS as the base system, allowing you to download third-party apps and supporting gestures and dark mode.









FEATURES AN ANTI-INTERFERENCE CIRCUIT DESIGN WITH ENHANCED POWER SUPPLY


FiiO has carefully designed the M11 Plus ESS to deliver outstanding performance. To enable this, the M11 Plus ESS adopts an upgraded internal layout and a modular circuit design where each module of the circuit has its shielding cover to separate it from other modules. This design offers less electrical interference while keeping the digital and analogue portions isolated, ensuring the lowest electrical noise and delivering clean sound. M11 Plus ESS has also been embedded with an enhanced power supply, where the front low pass filter, signal amp and amp expansion circuits have their independent power supply. This helps achieve better dynamics and offers excellent thermal management on the device. Independent shielding has also been utilised with thermal silica gel, graphene and nickel silver heat sink to absorb and dissipate heat as needed.













ALL-NEW DIGITAL AUDIO PURIFICATION SYSTEMS AND INTELLIGENT VOLUME SYSTEMS


FiiO has equipped the M11 Plus ESS with their Digital Audio Purification System (DAPS), featuring a 4th generation FGPA and NDK femtosecond crystal oscillator. This system enables the audio data to pass through the FPGA with phase-locked loop technology, which works in conjunction with two custom Japanese NDK femtosecond crystal oscillators to provide a high-precision and low jitter unified clock source for the entire audio architecture. This system essentially achieves a jitter-free clean sound. Fused with this is the upgraded Carbon fibre volume panel which features a unique button + touch panel design. This new generation volume panel takes less space and offers precise volume adjustments with Five methods. You can slide on the panel, press the buttons, use the touch screen, FiiO Link and via Bluetooth remote control to change the volume.






GO WIRELESS WITH TWO WAY BLUETOOTH CONNECTION AND EXPERIENCE 8X MQA DECODING


The FiiO M11 Plus ESS offer Bluetooth 5.0 two way connectivity. Two-way Bluetooth connectivity allows you to stream your music from a smartphone or a tablet effortlessly with support for high-quality transmission codecs like aptX, aptX HD, LDAC, AAC and SBC, for a resolution equal or superior to CD quality in wireless mode. The M11 Plus ESS also offers support for DLNA and Airplay streaming. The processing power of the M11 Plus ESS allows for 8x decoding of MQA data and even MQA rendering in USB mode, reproducing the master quality from source files! With Bluetooth 5.0 and MQA decoding, you can connect to the M11 Plus ESS wirelessly and not lose any audio signal quality.









3 OUTPUT PORTS WITH 3 GAIN LEVEL SETTINGS, 5 OPERATIONAL MODES & DSD TECHNOLOGY


FiiO has designed the M11 Plus ESS to suit most users by offering multiple output ports, three gain level settings and five distinct operational modes. FiiO M11 Plus ESS houses three headphone output ports, 2.5mm, 4.4mm balanced and 3.5mm single-ended ports to connect various headphones. The M11 Plus ESS offers balanced line-out functionality with the 4.4mm output port to connect the M11 Plus ESS with amplifiers. To provide ample power, FiiO has incorporated 3 gain-level settings - low, medium and high, with each gain level offering 120 steps of control. This is perfect to use high-impedance headphones or even sensitive IEMs. The Device further offers 5 operational modes like Android mode, Pure Music mode, Bluetooth Reception mode, USB DAC mode and AirPlay mode for users to choose. M11 Plus ESS also comes with 3rd gen All to DSD technology which offers 30% lower power consumption and lowers unwanted harmonics for accurate sound with DSD512 native decoding.










DUAL HI-RES CERTIFIED DEVICE WITH PATENT WINNING IN-CAR MODE AND DEDICATED SHORTCUT BUTTON


FiiO M11 Plus ESS has been awarded dual certification for “Hi-Res Audio” and “Hi-Res Audio Wireless” for its ability to restore and preset audio in three-dimensional quality and supporting 96kHz/24Bit and LDAC protocols to deliver the highest quality sound wirelessly. The M11 Plus ESS has also been a National Patent completion winner for its exclusive In-Vehicle mode of operation. FiiO realised that a lot of people listen to music in their car and thus optimised the device to offer an audiophile listening experience. When connected to a car stereo system, the M11 Plus ESS automatically adapts the user interface to make the in-vehicle use safe and easy. FiiO has also embedded a highly customisable shortcut button that can easily switch operational modes, switch filters, play random tracks and much more. All this with just a click of a button.










BUILT WITH A HONEYCOMB DESIGN, 5.5INCH SCREEN AND MASSIVE BATTERY WITH FAST CHARGING


The FiiO M11 Plus ESS has been designed with a hexagonal honeycomb design with 3D cuts to offer an engaging experience aesthetically. The body and buttons on the device seamlessly come together to grab your attention. The rear panel showcases a diamond-cut textured cover with prismatic colours when viewed from different angles. The M11 Plus ESS features a stunning HD 5.5” display with an aspect ratio of 18:9 and offers accurate colour temperature and an excellent visual experience. To power the M11 Plus ESS, it is embedded with a 6000mAh massive battery that offers up to 14 hours of continuous playtime and 1000 hours of standby time. M11 Plus ESS supports 27W Fast Charge with QC2.0/3.0/4.0 and USB PD fast charging. To get you started, the M11 Plus ESS comes bundled with tempered glass with an oleophobic coating to protect your screen, a custom leather case and a USB 3.0 charging cable.
