FAQS

What is the warranty on the FiiO M11 Plus ESS?

All FiiO products come with a year warranty. You can simply get in touch with us to claim the warranty.Click here.

hat should I do if the system crashes or freezes?

1.【Force to reboot】 Please hold the power button for around 10 seconds until the "FiiO" logo shows up.  2.【Extract a LOG file】For special software issues, please extract a LOG file under the root directory, unzip and copy it to the homepage. And then send it to us for analysis. The name of the folder: fiio_log  3.【Fail to be charged or turned on】 a. Hold the power button for about 10 seconds when it is charging b.Try other power adapters and charging cables. c.The battery of your device may be overused, so it needs to be refreshed through low-current power. It is suggested to charge it through the computer for more than 2 hours, and then unplug the charging cable to see whether it can be turned on. d. If the problem still exists, please try to leave the device aside for 2 to 3 days, and then charge it again. Because sometimes its system may be stuck, it would return to normal when the device runs out of power.

 How to access the storage/SD card after connecting the M11 Plus ESS to a computer? 

For Windows computers, it is driver-free. After connecting the M11 Plus ESS to the computer by the included USB cable, the driver will be automatically installed. Then the FiiO M11Plus disk can be directly seen on the computer.  Mac computers need a driver. 1.After connecting the M11 Plus ESS to the Mac computer, click the "NO NAME" folder emerging on the desktop->double click Mac->Mac/MAC OS MTP Client->Android File Transfer.dmg. Drag the "Android File Transfer.dmg" to the desktop of the computer.  2. Drag the "Android File Transfer" file to the "Applications" folder and wait for the completion of the copy.  3. Enter "Applications", and double click the "Android File Transfer". Then you can manage the files stored in the internal storage of the M11 Plus ESS or the Micro SD card.

How to upgrade the M11 Plus ESS?

The M11 Plus ESS supports online upgrade and local upgrade.  1.Online upgrade If a new firmware is available and can be detected (with the M11 Plus ESS connected to an available internet), an upgrade notification will show up in the notification center. Tap on it to enter the update menu for the online upgrade. If there's no upgrade notification showing up, you can go to the "Technical Support->Firmware Upgrade" menu, and tap the "Check for updates" icon to check manually.  2.Local upgrade Also, the M11 Plus ESS can be upgraded locally by a firmware package. Download the firmware package file from FiiO website, and copy it to the internal storage of the M11 Plus ESS or an SD card. Go to the "Technical Support->Firmware Upgrade->Local Upgrade" menu, and find the firmware package file to start the upgrade.

How to install third-party applications?

There are two ways to install applications that are similar to mobile phones'.  1.After connecting the device to a valid WiFi, go to FiiO market, Google Play or other app markets to download and install the app directly.  2.Local installation: copy the APK file to the M11 Plus ESS. Go to the file management menu to find the file and install it.

How to switch the working mode of the M11 Plus ESS?

The M11 Plus ESS has 5 independent working modes: Android mode, Pure Music mode, Bluetooth Receiving mode, USB DAC mode and AirPlay mode. It is defaulted to be the Android mode, which can be switched to other working modes in the drop-down menu.  If the player is in other modes but not the Android mode, you can switch it to other modes through the selection on the display, or tap Settings->Exit to go back to Android mode.

How to use the volume touch panel?

Long or short pressing the volume+/- button can adjust the volume, or adjust it by touching the volume touch panel.

How to enable the USB DAC function?

For Mac computers, it is driver-free.  For Windows computers, please make the settings as the followed steps. 1.Install the FiiO DAC driver in the computer first. 2.Switch the working mode of the M11 Plus ESS to USB DAC mode on the drop-down menu or go to Settings->Mode choose menu to enter the USB DAC mode. 3. Connect the M11 Plus ESS to the computer by the USB port. Select the M11 Plus ESS as the audio input both in the computer and the music app, so it can work.

 How to use the M11 Plus ESS as a Bluetooth receiver? 

1. Go to the drop-down or Settings menu of the M11 Plus ESS, and choose the working mode as Bluetooth receiving mode.  2. Go to the Bluetooth transmitting list of the mobile phone, and tap the M11 Plus ESS to complete the connection.

How to use the M11 Plus ESS as a Bluetooth transmitter?

1. Go to the Settings->Bluetooth menu to turn on the Bluetooth function. 2.Make the Bluetooth receiving device, such as Bluetooth earphones, enter the pairing state. (Please refer to the user manual of the Bluetooth receiving device about how to enter pairing state.) 3.Go to the Bluetooth device list of the M11 Plus ESS->Pair new device to complete the connection.

What is the Bluetooth version on the FiiO M11 Plus ESS?

The FiiO M11 Plus ESS comes with Bluetooth version 5.0

What Bluetooth codecs does the M11 Plus ESS support? And how to switch the Bluetooth codecs? 

The M11 Plus ESS supports LDAC, aptX-HD, aptX, AAC and SBC which can be switched on Settings->Audio->Wireless playback quality menu. Note that it needs to be disconnected and reconnected to enable the new codec after changing it.

 How to connect the M11 Plus ESS to an external decoder? Does it support USB audio digital output? 

The M11 Plus ESS supports USB audio. The setting steps are as follows. 1. Enable "USB output" in FiiO Music app of the M11 Plus. 2.Use an OTG cable to connect the M11 Plus ESS and the external decoder. 3.Open FiiO Music app or other music applications to use the M11 Plus ESS as a USB digital output device.

What is the function of the M11 Plus ESS' In-vehicle mode? And how to use it?

【Principle】After turning on the In-vehicle mode, you can connect the M11 Plus ESS to the on-board USB port, and the M11 Plus ESS will power on automatically and switch to the In-vehicle mode screen when the vehicle engine starts, and power off automatically when the vehicle engine stops.  【How to set】Go to Settings->Global->In-vehicle mode, or the drop-down menu to turn on the in-vehicle mode.

What power supply adapter is suggested to charge the M11 Plus ESS?

QC2.0, QC3.0 and MTK PE quick charging protocols are supported. If the power adapter does not support the above protocols, it will not trigger the quick charging function. Therefore, it is not suggested to use it.  For non-quick charging adapters, the 5V 1A/2A ones are recommended.

How to use the AirPlay function?

The AirPlay function will only be available when connecting the M11 Plus ESS to iOS devices but not Android devices. There are mainly 3 steps. 1. Make sure the M11 Plus ESS and your iOS devices are connected to the same WiFi network. 2.Switch the M11 Plus ESS to the AirPlay mode. 3.On the drop-down menu of the iOS device, choose the M11 Plus ESS as the playing device. So the M11 Plus ESS can receive audio signals from the iOS device.

How to use the DLNA function?

The DLNA function means the M11 Plus ESS can read and receive music files stored on the device (name it Device A) which supports DLNA function through WiFi.  1. Make sure the M11 Plus ESS and Device A are connected to the same WiFi network. 2.On the FiiO Music app of the M11 Plus ESS, tap DLNA on the main menu and search for Device A to play music of it.

How to avoid misoperation on the volume touch panel?

Go to the Settings->Global->Volume touch panel setting menu to turn on the Auto Lock Without Operation function.  Notes: 1. If the "Auto lock without operation" is turned on, the volume touch panel needs to be tapped twice each time to enable it before using. 2. If the volume touch panel is locked, the volume can still be adjusted by long or short pressing the volume +/- button without unlocking it.

What can be done if the volume is too low when the M11 Plus ESS is connected to AirPods?

1.Go to Settings->About phone, and continuously tap the "Build number" 7 times to activate the Developer mode. 2.Go back to Settings->System->Developer options menu to turn off the"Disable absolute volume". 3.Disconnect and reconnect the Bluetooth.

What are the Hardware used in the FiiO M11 Plus ESS?

The FiiO M11 Plus ESS is loaded with Soc: Snapdragon 660, DAC: ES9068AS*2, Amp: THX AAA-78*2, Bluetooth: QCC5124, USB: XMOS XUF208, NDK Femtosecond Crystal Oscillator*2.

What is the battery capacity on the FiiO M11 Plus ESS?

The FiiO M11 Plus ESS offers about 6000mAh battery.

DESCRIPTION


SHANLING'S SMALLEST PORTABLE ANDROID MUSIC PLAYER IS HERE!


By far the smallest music player from Shanling, the M3X features a 4.2-inch touch screen in a 3:2 ratio. It has 768 * 1280 resolution and 356 PPI. Designed to easily fit into your pockets, the Shanling M3X can be managed efficiently using one hand.














PACKS A NEW-GEN DUAL DAC CONFIGURATION + TANTALUM CAPACITORS FOR A HI-FI SOUND


Using the new-gen Dual ES9219C Sabre DAC/AMP, the Shanling M3X allows you to enjoy your music in Shanling's Hi-Fi sound while also optimising the battery life. The integration of AVX tantalum capacitors into the audio circuit of the M3X helps it to enhance the bass response.









WITH ACCURATE SOUND OUTPUT AND SUPPORT TO HIGH-GRADE MQA PLAYBACK 


Powered with two Japanese KDS active crystal oscillators and Shanling's enhanced FPGA coding technology, the Shanling M3X offers accurate audio response while decoding PCM or DSD data, up to 32bit/384kHz and DSD256. The all-new DAC of the player adds native hardware support to MQA technology. This allows full support of the MQA playback with 16x rendering for high-quality music streaming.





AN OPEN-ANDROID BASED MUSIC PLAYER FOR AN ULTIMATE USER-CONVENIENCE


Open up to the world of music software, podcasting apps and streaming services with Shanling M3X's open Android system. Engineered with Octa-Core Snapdragon 430 processor, the Shanling M3X comes with 2GB RAM, 32GB Memory and a MicroSD card slot There is an option to use the player in a simplified Prime mode.













ENJOY HI-FI SOUND WITH AGLO TECHNOLOGY & UP TO 23 HOURS OF PLAYTIME


With a 3200 mAh battery, the Shanling M3X offers the best-in-class 23 hours of battery life that can easily get you through the day. Moreover, the super-efficient audio circuit and special single DAC mode optimise the battery life of the M3X. With the Integrated AGLO technology, the Shanling M3X ensures accurate and full-quality audio processing.





DOUBLES UP AS A BLUETOOTH/USB DAC, SUPPORTS SE 3.5MM & 4.4 MM BALANCED OUTPUT 


With support to high-quality Bluetooth Codecs like the LDAC, you can connect the Shanling M3X to Bluetooth headphones or speakers to enjoy great sound. You can even use the M3X as a high-quality Bluetooth receiver by pairing it to your smartphone. Use it as a USB DAC for your computer or as a Digital USB transport for standalone USB DAC. It supports up to 32bit/384kHz and DSD 256. Unleash the true potential of the Shanling M3X by switching from the single-ended 3.5mm to balanced 4.4mm output. This requires increased power output but it leads to a powerful audio performance as well.

FAQs

What is the warranty period on the Shanling M3X?

The warranty period of the Shanling M3X is of 1 year. In order to claim warranty, please visit our Shanling Warranty Page here. We are very helpful guys, just saying

Does the Shanling M3X support Savan or Spotify?

The Shanling M3X lets you install other streaming platforms like Tidal, Spotify, Apple Music, Saavn, and more.

What is the battery life on the Shanling M3X?

If you are using the 3.5mm audio output in the single DAC mode, the Shanling M3X offers up to 23 hours of playtime. This battery life reduces to 20 hours if you use the 3.5mm output in dual DAC mode. Moreover, if the 4.4mm balanced output is in use, the battery will last for up to 19 hours.

Does the Shanling M3X support aptX?

Yes, the Shanling M3X does support Bluetooth codecs like LDAC, LHDC, aptX HD, aptX and SBC.

Which DAC Chip does the Shanling M3X come with?

The Shanling M3X is loaded with Dual ESS ES9219C DAC Chips that offer a great audiophile sound quality.

Does the Shanling M3X support balanced sound output?

The Shanling M3X supports 4.4mm balanced output.

Does the Shanling M3X support WiFi?

Yes, the Shanling M3X does support WiFi connectivity.

What is the Bluetooth version on the Shanling M3X?

The Shanling M3X comes with Bluetooth version 4.2
